GS40caraka_u:12: sabhyāḥ sadguruvāksudhāsrutiparisphītaśrutīn asmi vo nālaṃ toṣayituṃ payodapayasā nāmbhonidhis tṛpyati /
GS40caraka_u:13: vyākhyābhāsarasaprakāśanam idaṃ tv asmin yadi prāpyate kvāpi kvāpi kaṇo guṇasya tadasau karṇe kṣaṇaṃ dhīyatām // 6
GS40caraka_u:14_0: iha hi dharmārthakāmamokṣaparipanthirogopaśamāya brahmaprabhṛtibhiḥ praṇītāyurvedatantreṣvativistaratvena samprati vartamānālpāyurmedhasāṃ
GS40caraka_u:14_1: puruṣāṇāṃ na samyagarthādhigamaḥ tadanadhigamācca tadvihitārthānāmananuṣṭhāne tathaivopaplavo rujāmiti manvānaḥ paramakāruṇiko
GS40caraka_u:14_2: 'trabhavān agniveśo'lpāyurmedhasāmapi suropalambhārthaṃ nātisaṃkṣepavistaraṃ kāyacikitsāpradhānam āyurvedatantraṃ praṇetum
GS40caraka_u:15: tasmiṃśca ślokanidānavimānaśārīrendriyacikitsitakalpasiddhisthānātmake 'bhidhātavye nikhilatantrapradhānārthābhidhāya ktā ityādivākyābhidhāyakena darśitaṃ mantavyam // 9
GS40caraka_u:16_0: nanu prayojanābhidhānaṃ śāstrapravṛttyarthamiti yaduktaṃ tanna yuktaṃ yato na prayojanābhidhānamātreṇa prayojanavattāvadhāraṇaṃ
GS40caraka_u:18: atha manyase āptaprayojanābhidhānametadato'tra yathārthatvaṃ nanu bho
GS40caraka_u:19_0: kathamayaṃ prayojanābhidhāyī āptaḥ tadabhihitaśāstrasya yathārthatvāditi cet hanta na yāvacchāstrasya prayojanavattāvadhāraṇaṃ
GS40caraka_u:19_1: na tāvacchāstrapravṛttiḥ na yāvacchāstrapravṛttir na tāvacchāstrasya yathārthatvāvadhāraṇaṃ na yāvacchāstrasya yathārthatvāvadhāraṇaṃ
GS40caraka_u:19_2: na tāvacchāstrasya karturāptatvamavadhāryate āptatvānavadhṛtau ca kutas tadabhihitaprayojanavattāvadhāraṇam iti cakrakamāpadyate
GS40caraka_u:20_0: bhavatu prayojanavattāvadhāraṇam artharūpaprayojanavattāsaṃdeha eva pravartako bhaviṣyati kṛṣyādāv api hi pravṛttir arthasaṃdehādeva
GS40caraka_u:20_1: na hi tatra kṛṣīvalānāṃ phalalābhāvadhāraṇaṃ vidyate antarāvagrahāderapisaṃbhāvyamānatvāt nanvevamasatyapi prayojanābhidhāne
GS40caraka_u:21_0: naivaṃ nahi sāmānyena prayojanasaṃdehaḥ prayojanaviśeṣārthinaṃ tathā pravartayati yathābhipretaprayojanaviśeṣaviṣayaḥ saṃdehaḥ
GS40caraka_u:21_1: abhipretaviśeṣaviṣayaśca saṃdeho na viśeṣaviṣayasmaraṇamantarā bhavati ato ye tāvad anavadhṛtāgniveśaprāmāṇyās teṣāṃ dhātusāmyasādhanamidaṃ
GS40caraka_u:21_2: śāstraṃ na vetyevam ākāraviśeṣasaṃdehotpādanārthaṃ prayojanaviśeṣābhidhānaṃ ye punaḥ paramarṣeragniveśasyādyata evāvadhṛtaprāmāṇyāsteṣāṃ
GS40caraka_u:22: prayojanābhidhāyivākye tu svalpaprayatnabodhye prayojanasāmānyasaṃdehādeva pravṛttirupapannā na punaranekasaṃvatsarakleśabodhye śāstre // 13
GS40caraka_u:23: tadevaṃ yaducyate prayojanābhidhāyivākyapravṛttāv api prayojanamabhidhātavyaṃ tathā cānavasthā iti tannirastaṃ bhavati // 14
GS40caraka_u:26: granthādau maṅgalasevānirastāntarāyāṇāṃ granthakartṛśrotḥṇām avighneneṣṭalābho bhavatīti yuktaṃ maṅgalopādānam // 16
GS40caraka_u:27: athaśabdasya maṅgalatve smṛtir oṃkāraś cāthaśabdaśca dvāv etau brahmaṇaḥ purā // 17
GS40caraka_u:28: kaṇṭhaṃ bhittvā viniryātau tena māṅgalikāv ubhau iti // 18
GS40caraka_u:30: yathā atha śabdānuśāsanam athāto dharmaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ vai ityādau // 20
GS40caraka_u:31_0: abhīṣṭadevatānamaskārastu granthādau śiṣṭācāraprāptaḥ paramaśiṣṭenāgniveśena kṛta eva anyathā śiṣṭācāralaṅghanena śiṣṭatvameva
GS40caraka_u:31_1: na syād vyākhyānāntarāyabhayaśca tathā granthāviniveśitasyāpi namaskārasya pratyavāyāpahatvācca na granthaniveśanam // 21
GS40caraka_u:32_0: yathā ca gurvājñālābhānantaram etat tantrakaraṇaṃ tathā atha maitrīparaḥ puṇyam ityādau sphuṭameva granthakaraṇe ca gurvanumatipratipādanena
GS40caraka_u:33_0: yat punaḥ śiṣyapraśnānantaryārthatvam athaśabdasya varṇyate tanna māṃ dhinoti nahi śiṣyān puro vyavasthāpya śāstraṃ kriyate
GS40caraka_u:33_1: śrotṛbuddhisthīkāre tu śāstrakaraṇaṃ yuktaṃ na ca buddhisthīkṛtāḥ praṣṭāro bhavanti // 24
GS40caraka_u:34_0: ataḥśabdo 'dhikāraprāgavadhyupadarśakaḥ ata ūrdhvaṃ yad upadekṣyāmo dīrghaṃjīvitīyaṃ taditi yadi vā hetau yena brahmādipraṇītāyurvedatantrāṇām
GS40caraka_u:34_1: uktena nyāyenotsambandhatvam iva ato hetor dīrghaṃjīvitīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti yojanīyam // 25
GS40caraka_u:35: dīrghaṃjīvitīyam ityatra dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdo 'sminn astīti matvarthe adhyāyānuvākayor luk ca iti chapratyayaḥ // 26
GS40caraka_u:36: yadi vā dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdam adhikṛtya kṛto grantho 'dhyāyarūpastantrarūpo
GS40caraka_u:37: vā ityasyāṃ vivakṣāyām adhikṛtya kṛte granthe ityadhikārāt śiśukrandayamasabha ityādinā chaḥ evamanyatrāpyevaṃjātīye mantavyam // 28
GS40caraka_u:38: atra ca satyapi śabdāntare dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdenaiva saṃjñā kṛtā dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdasyaiva pravacanādau niveśāt praśastatvācca // 29
GS40caraka_u:39: dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdo 'sminn asti iti dīrghaṃjīvitaśabdam adhikṛtya kṛto vā
GS40caraka_u:40: ityanayā vyutpattyā dīrghaṃjīvitīyaśabdas tantre 'dhyāye ca pravartanīyaḥ // 30
GS40caraka_u:41_0: tena dīrghaṃjīvitīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma ityanena tantraṃ prati vyākhyānapratijñā labdhā bhavati punar dīrghaṃjīvitīyam iti padam
GS40caraka_u:42: dṛṣṭaṃ cāvṛtya padasya yojanaṃ yathā apāmārgataṇḍulīye gaurave śirasaḥ śūle pīnase ityādau śirasa iti padaṃ gaurave ityanena yujyate āvṛtya śūle ityanena ca // 32
GS40caraka_u:43: ataśca yaducyate akṛtatantrapratijñasyādhyāyapratijñā ūnakāyamāneti tannirastaṃ bhavati //
GS40caraka_u:44_0: yadi vā adhyāyapratijñaivāstu tayaiva tantrapratijñāpyarthalabdhaiva na hy adhyāyas tantravyatiriktaḥ tenāvayavavyākhyāne
GS40caraka_u:44_1: tantrasyāpyavayavino vyākhyā bhavatyeva yathā aṅgulīgrahaṇena devadatto'pi gṛhīto bhavati // 34
GS40caraka_u:45: avayavāntaravyākhyānapratijñā tu na labhyate tāṃ tu pratyadhyāyameva kariṣyati // 35
GS40caraka_u:46: adhyāyamiti adhipūrvādiṅaḥ iṅaśca iti karmaṇi ghañā sādhyam // 36
GS40caraka_u:48_0: na cānayā vyutpattyā prakaraṇacatuṣkasthānādiṣvatiprasaṅgaḥ yato yogarūḍheyam adhyāyasaṃjñādhyāyasya prakaraṇasamūhaviśeṣa
GS40caraka_u:48_1: eva dīrghaṃjīvitīyādilakṣaṇe paṅkajaśabdavadvartate na yogamātreṇa vartate vakṣyati hi adhikṛtyeyamadhyāyanāmasaṃjñā pratiṣṭhitā
GS40caraka_u:48_2: iti nāmasaṃjñā yogarūḍhasaṃjñetyarthaḥ yadi vā karaṇādhikaraṇayor arthayoḥ // 40
GS40caraka_u:53: cakṣiṅo hi prayoge'nicchato 'pi vyākhyātuḥ kriyāphalasambandhasya durnivāratvena svaritañita ityādinātmanepadaṃ syāditi // 45
GS40caraka_u:55_0: āṅayaṃ kriyāyoge ye tu maryādāyām abhividhau vā āṅprayogaṃ manyante teṣām abhiprāyaṃ na vidmaḥ yato maryādāyāmabhividhau
GS40caraka_u:55_1: cāṅaḥ prātipadikena yogaḥ syāt yathā āsamudrakṣitīśānām āpāṭalīputrād vṛṣṭo deva ityādau ihāpi ca tathā // 48
GS40caraka_u:56: kriyāyogavirahe upasargāḥ kriyāyoge iti niyamād āṅa upasargatvaṃ na syāt tataścānupasargeṇāṅā vyavadhānād ver upasargasya prayogo na syāt // 49
GS40caraka_u:57: yenāvyavahitaḥ sajātīyavyavahito vā dhātor upasargo bhavati // 50
GS40caraka_u:58: vyāṅor ubhayor apyanupasargatve tatsambandhocitabhūriprātipadikakalpanāgauravaprasaṅgaḥ syāt tasmāt kriyāyogitvam evāṅo nyāyyam // 51
GS40caraka_u:59: atha ataḥ dīrghaṃ jīvitīyam adhyāyaṃ vi ā khyāsyāma ityaṣṭapadatvam // 52]
GS40caraka_u:62_0: nanu kathamagniveśaḥ sakalapadārthāśeṣaviśeṣajñānavyākhyeyam āyurvedaṃ vyākhyāsyati yato na tāvad bheṣajādīnām aśeṣaviśeṣapratyakṣajñeyaḥ
GS40caraka_u:62_1: sarvapadārthānāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣāviṣayatvāt anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tu sarvapadārthāvadhāraṇaṃ duṣkarameva yata ekam eva
GS40caraka_u:62_2: madhu svarūpeṇa jīvayati mārayati coṣṇaṃ samaghṛtaṃ ca kaphaprakṛterhitamahitaṃ vātaprakṛteḥ anūpe sātmyamasātmyaṃ marau
GS40caraka_u:62_3: śīte sevyamasevyaṃ grīṣme hitam avṛddhe vṛddhe cāhitam alpaṃ guṇakaram ābādhakaram atyupayuktam āmatāṃ gatam udare upakramavirodhitvād
GS40caraka_u:62_4: ativibhramakaraṃ kākamācīyuktaṃ pakvanikucena ca sahopayuktaṃ maraṇāya athavā balavarṇavīryatejaupaghātāya bhavati ityevamādi
GS40caraka_u:62_5: tattad yuktaṃ tattacchataśaḥ karoti ata evaikasyaiva madhuno rūpaṃ yadānena prakāreṇa duradhigamaṃ tadātra kaiva kathā nikhilapadārthāśeṣaviśeṣajñānasya
GS40caraka_u:62_6: ajānaṃśca vyācakṣāṇaḥ kathamupādeyavacana iti kṛtvā guror āptāt pratipannaṃ pratipādayiṣyāma iti
GS40caraka_u:63: darśayan tāmimāṃ śaṅkāṃ nirācikīrṣur gurūktānuvādarūpatāṃ svagranthasya darśayannāha iti ha smāha bhagavānātreya iti // 1
GS40caraka_u:64: atra itiśabdo vakṣyamāṇārthaparāmarśakaḥ haśabdo'vadhāraṇe yathā na ha vai saśarīrasya priyāpriyayorapahatirastīti atra na heti naivetyarthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:65: atra smāha iti smaśabdaprayogena bhūtamātra eva liḍarthe laṭ sme iti laṭ na bhūtānadyatanaparokṣe ātreyopadeśasyāgniveśaṃ pratyaparokṣatvāt // 3
GS40caraka_u:66: yathā ca bhūtamātre liḍ bhavati tathāca darśayiṣyāmaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:67: bhagaṃ pūjitaṃ jñānaṃ tadvān yathoktam utpattiṃ pralayaṃ caiva bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim // 5
GS40caraka_u:68: vetti vidyāmavidyāṃ ca sa vācyo bhagavāniti yadi vā bhagaśabdaḥ samastaiśvaryamāhātmyādivacanaḥ yathoktam aiśvaryasya samagrasya vīryasya yaśasaḥ śriyaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:71: atrānye varṇayanti caturvidhaṃ sūtraṃ bhavati gurusūtraṃ śiṣyasūtraṃ pratisaṃskartṛsūtram ekīyasūtraṃ ceti // 9
GS40caraka_u:72_0: tatra gurusūtraṃ yathā naitad buddhimatā draṣṭavyam agniveśa ityādi pratisaṃskartṛsūtraṃ yathā tamuvāca bhagavānātreyaḥ ityādi
GS40caraka_u:72_1: śiṣyasūtraṃ yathā naitāni bhagavan pañcakaṣāyaśatāni pūryante ityādi ekīyasūtraṃ yathā kumārasya śiraḥ pūrvamabhinirvartata
GS40caraka_u:75: itiśabdena ca prakāravācinā dīrghaṃjīvitīyaṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti parāmṛśyate tenāha smeti bhūtānadyatanaparokṣa eva bhavati pratisaṃskartāraṃ pratyātreyopadeśasya parokṣatvāt // 12
GS40caraka_u:76: anena ca nyāyena tamuvāca bhagavānātreya ityādāv api liḍvidhir upapanno bhavati // 13
GS40caraka_u:77: suśrute ca yathovāca bhagavān dhanvantariḥ iti pratisaṃskartṛsūtramiti kṛtvā ṭīkākṛtā liḍvidhir upapāditaḥ iti // 14
GS40caraka_u:78_0: atra brūmaḥ yattāvaduktaṃ śiṣyasyāgniveśasya vyākhyānānadhikārādidaṃ guroḥ sūtraṃ tanna nahi jātyā gurutvam asti yataḥ sa
GS40caraka_u:78_1: evātreyaḥ svagurum apekṣya śiṣyaḥ agniveśādīn apekṣya guruḥ evamagniveśo 'pi granthakaraṇakāle svabuddhisthīkṛtāñśiṣyān prati
GS40caraka_u:79_0: yatpunardvitīyasya pratisaṃskartṛsūtratayā bhūtānadyatanaparokṣe liḍvidhir upapādyate tatra vicāryaṃ kim idaṃ dvitīyaṃ sūtraṃ
GS40caraka_u:79_1: pūrvavākyaikatāpannaṃ na vā yadyekavākyatāpannaṃ tadā suśrute tathā vyākhyāsyāmo yathovāca dhanvantarir iti yojanīyaṃ tathāca
GS40caraka_u:79_2: tathā vyākhyāsyāma iti kriyaikavākyatāpannam uvācetipadaṃ na bhinnakartṛkaṃ bhavitum arhati tathā ca kuto liḍvidhiḥ atha
GS40caraka_u:81: kiṃca jatūkarṇādau pratisaṃskartṛśrutigandho 'pi nāsti tat kathaṃ
GS40caraka_u:82: nānāśrutaparipūrṇakaṇṭhaḥ śiṣyo jatūkarṇaḥ prāñjalir adhigamyovāca ityādau liḍvidhiḥ // 17
GS40caraka_u:83: anena nyāyena carake 'pi pratisaṃskartṛsūtrapakṣe liḍvidhirnāsti tasmāccarake 'gniveśaḥ suśrute suśruta eva sūtrāṇāṃ praṇetā kvacit
GS40caraka_u:84_0: kiṃcidarthaṃ stotuṃ nindituṃ vākhyāyikārūpaṃ purākalpaṃ darśayan kimapi sūtraṃ gurūktānuvādarūpatayā kimapyekīyamatānuvādarūpatayā
GS40caraka_u:84_1: likhati pratisaṃskartā tv ayaṃ granthaṃ pūrayati tadādyagranthakartṛtayaiva liḍvidhistu bhūtānadyatanamātra eva chandovihito
GS40caraka_u:84_2: bhāṣāyāmapi varṇanīyaḥ anyathā uvāceti padaṃ jatūkarṇādau na syāt tathā ca harivaṃśe dhanyopākhyāne māmuvāca iti tathā ahamuvāca
GS40caraka_u:84_3: iti ca na syāt yathā sa māmuvācāmbucaraḥ kūrmo mānuṣavat svayam // 19
GS40caraka_u:85: kimāścaryaṃ mayi mune dhanyaścāhaṃ kathaṃ vibho iti tathā svyambhuvacanāt so 'haṃ vedān vai samupasthitaḥ // 20
GS40caraka_u:87_0: yadapi iti ha smāha ityatra itiśabdena pūrvasūtraṃ parāmṛśyate tanna yena dīrghaṃjīvitīyādisūtramātrasya tadarthasya vā gurūktatvapratipādane
GS40caraka_u:87_1: sati naivottaratrābhidheyābhidhānena nikhilatantrasya gurūktānuvādarūpatayā karaṇaṃ śrotṛśraddhākaraṇaṃ pratipāditaṃ bhavati //
GS40caraka_u:88: bhavati tu bhāvayituṃ yathā purā vyākhyātaṃ tasmāttadeva nyāyyamiti // 23
GS40caraka_u:89: agniveśasya vyākhyāsyāma iti bahuvacanam ekasminn apy asmadaḥ prayogādbahuvacanaprayogasya sādhutvāt sādhu hi vadanti vaktāro vayaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ iti // 24
GS40caraka_u:90: bhagavānātreya ityatra tv ekavacananirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ bhagavānityanenaivātreyasya gurorgauravasya darśitatvāt // 25]
GS40caraka_u:94: jagrāha nikhilenādāv aśvinau tu punas tataḥ // Car_1,1.4
GS40caraka_u:100: sametāḥ puṇyakarmāṇaḥ pārśve himavataḥ śubhe // Car_1,1.7
GS40caraka_u:102: ātreyo gautamaḥ sāṃkhyaḥ pulastyo nārado'sitaḥ // Car_1,1.8
GS40caraka_u:108: baḍiśaḥ śaralomā ca kāpyakātyāyanāv ubhau // Car_1,1.11
GS40caraka_u:110: śarkarākṣo hiraṇyākṣo lokākṣaḥ paiṅgireva ca // Car_1,1.12
GS40caraka_u:118: bahvṛṣīṇām atra kīrtanaṃ granthādau pāpakṣayahetutvena tathāyurvedasyaivaṃvidhamahāpuruṣasevitatvena sevyatvopadarśanārthaṃ ceti
GS40caraka_u:119: eṣu ca madhye kecid yāyāvarāḥ kecicchālīnāḥ kecidayonijāḥ evaṃprakārāśca sarve mīlitā boddhavyāḥ bhikṣurityātreyaviśeṣaṇaṃ vakṣyati hi tanneti bhikṣur ātreyaḥ iti // 4
GS40caraka_u:129: atha te śaraṇaṃ śakraṃ dadṛśurdhyānacakṣuṣā // Car_1,1.17
GS40caraka_u:132: dhāraṇāddharmaḥ sa cātmasamavetaḥ kāryadarśanānumeyaḥ arthaḥ suvarṇādiḥ kāmyata ita kāmo vanitāpariṣvaṅgādiḥ mokṣaḥ saṃsāravimokṣaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:135: uttamamiti pradhānaṃ tenārogyaṃ caturvarge pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ rogagṛhītasya kvacidapi puruṣārthe 'samarthatvād ityuktam // 4
GS40caraka_u:136_0: tasyāpahartāra iti ārogyasyāpahartāraḥ idam eva ca rogāṇām ārogyāpaharaṇaṃ yad anarthalābhaḥ na punar utpanno rogaḥ paścād
GS40caraka_u:137_0: śreyaso jīvitasya ceti śreyovajjīvitaṃ hitatvena sukhatvena cārthe daśamahāmūlīye vakṣyamāṇaṃ tasya jīvitasyāpahartāra iti
GS40caraka_u:137_1: yojanīyam aśreyojīvitamahitatvena duḥkhahetutayā cānupādeyam iti kṛtvā tadapaharaṇamiha noktam // 6
GS40caraka_u:138: atra sukhitajīvitopaghāto dharmādyupaghātenaiva labdhaḥ tena vayaṃ paśyāmaḥ śreyaḥśabdena sāmānye nābhyudayavācinā dharmādayo 'bhidhīyante
GS40caraka_u:139: jīvitaśabdena ca jīvitamātraṃ yato jīvitaṃ svarūpeṇaiva sarvaprāṇināṃ nirupādhyupādeyaṃ vacanaṃ hi ācakame ca brahmaṇa iyamātmā āśīḥ āyuṣmān bhūyāsam iti // 7

GS40caraka_u:350_1: ūṣmaṇaḥ prakṛtivikṛtivarṇau śauryaṃ bhayaṃ krodhaṃ harṣaṃ mohaṃ prasādam ityevamādīni cāparāṇi dvaṃdvānīti // Car_1,12.11
GS40caraka_u:352_0: pittāntargata iti vacanena śarīre jvālādiyuktavahniniṣedhena pittoṣmarūpasya vahneḥ sadbhāvaṃ darśayati na tu pittādabhedaṃ
GS40caraka_u:352_1: pitte nāgnimāndyasya grahaṇyadhyāye vakṣyamāṇatvāt tathā pittaharasya sarpiṣo'gnivardhanatvenoktatvāt // 1
GS40caraka_u:353_0: paktimapaktimiti avikṛtivikṛtibhedena pācakasyāgneḥ karma darśanādarśane netragatasyālocakasya ūṣmaṇo mātrāmātratvaṃ varṇabhedau
GS40caraka_u:353_1: ca tvaggatasya bhrājakasya bhayaśauryādayo hṛdayasthasya sādhakasya rañjakasya tu bahiḥsphuṭakāryādarśanād udāharaṇaṃ na
GS40caraka_u:354_0: tacchrutvā marīcivacaḥ kāpya uvāca soma eva śarīre śleṣmāntargataḥ kupitākupitaḥ śubhāśubhāni karoti tadyathā dārḍhyaṃ śaithilyamupacayaṃ
GS40caraka_u:354_1: kārśyam utsāhamālasyaṃ vṛṣatāṃ klībatāṃ jñānamajñānaṃ buddhiṃ mohamevamādīni cāparāṇi dvaṃdvānīti // Car_1,12.12
GS40caraka_u:357_0: tacchrutvā kāpyavaco bhagavān punarvasurātreya uvāca sarva eva bhavantaḥ samyag āhur anyatraikāntikavacanāt sarva eva khalu
GS40caraka_u:357_1: vātapittaśleṣmāṇaḥ prakṛtibhūtāḥ puruṣamavyāpannendriyaṃ balavarṇasukhopapannam āyuṣā mahatopapādayanti samyagevācaritā dharmārthakāmā
GS40caraka_u:358: puruṣamiha cāmuṣmiṃś ca loke vikṛtāstvenaṃ mahatā viparyayeṇopapādayanti kratavas traya iva vikṛtimāpannā lokamaśubhenopaghātakāla iti //
GS40caraka_u:359: tadṛṣayaḥ sarva evānumenire vacanamātreyasya bhagavato'bhinananduś ceti //
GS40caraka_u:362: guṇāḥ ṣaḍ dvividho hetur vividhaṃ karma yat punaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:363: vāyoścaturvidhaṃ karma pṛthak ca kaphapittayoḥ // Car_1,12.16
GS40caraka_u:365: kalākalīye vātasya tat sarvaṃ saṃprakāśitam // Car_1,12.17
GS40caraka_u:371: tatrāpi vipākādīnāmapi rasenaiva prāyo lakṣaṇīyatvādrasaprakaraṇam ādau kṛtam // 2]
GS40caraka_u:374: yaḥ kumāraśirā nāma bharadvājaḥ sa cānaghaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:375: śrīmān vāyorvidaścaiva rājā matimatāṃ varaḥ // Car_1,26.4
GS40caraka_u:384: rasenāhāraviniścayo rasāhāraviniścayaḥ kiṃvā ayaṃ rasaviniścayaḥ tathā paraṃ cāto vipākānām ityādirāhāraviniścayaḥ // 2]
GS40caraka_u:385: eka eva rasa ityuvāca bhadrakāpyaḥ yaṃ pañcānām indriyārthānām anyatamaṃ jihvāvaiṣayikaṃ bhāvamācakṣate kuśalāḥ sa punarudakādananya iti /
GS40caraka_u:386: dvau rasāv iti śākunteyo brāhmaṇaḥ chedanīya upaśamanīyaśceti /
GS40caraka_u:387: trayo rasā iti pūrṇākṣo maudgalyaḥ chedanīyopaśamanīyasādhāraṇā iti /
GS40caraka_u:388: catvāro rasā iti hiraṇyākṣaḥ kauśikaḥ svādurhitaśca svādur ahitaś cāsvādur hitaścāsvādur ahitaśceti
GS40caraka_u:389: pañca rasā iti kumāraśirā bharadvājaḥ bhaumaudakāgneyavāyavyāntarikṣāḥ /
GS40caraka_u:393: aparisaṃkhyeyā rasā iti kāṅkāyano vāhlīkabhiṣak āśrayaguṇakarmasaṃsvādaviśeṣāṇām aparisaṃkhyeyatvāt [{Āyurvedadīpikā}
GS40caraka_u:396: anyatamam iti ekam anyaśabdo hy ayamekavacanaḥ yathānyo dakṣiṇena gato
GS40caraka_u:397: 'nya uttareṇa eka ityarthaḥ tam appratyayaśca svārthikaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:400: udakādananya iti rasodakayor ekatvakhyāpanārthaṃ pūrvapakṣatvād aduṣṭam //
GS40caraka_u:402: hi rasatanmātraṃ gandhatanmātram ityādivacanena guṇāvyatiriktaṃ dravyamiti bruvate // 8
GS40caraka_u:405: sādhāraṇa ityāgneyasaumyasāmānyād ubhayor api laṅghanabṛṃhaṇayoḥ kartā parasparavirodhādakartā vā // 11
GS40caraka_u:406: svāduriti abhīṣṭaḥ hita iti āyatāv anapakārī // 12
GS40caraka_u:407: āśrīyata ityāśrayo dravyaṃ guṇāḥ snigdhagurvādayaḥ karma dhātuvardhanakṣapaṇādi saṃsvādaḥ rasānām avāntarabhedaḥ eṣāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ bhedānām ityarthaḥ // 13
GS40caraka_u:408: tatra dravyabhedād ādhārabhedenāśritasyāpi rasasya bhedo bhavati āśrayo hi kāraṇaṃ kāraṇabhedācca kāryabhedo 'vaśyaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ // 14
GS40caraka_u:410: tataś ca kāryabhedādavaśyaṃ kāraṇabheda iti pūrvapakṣābhiprāyaḥ // 16
GS40caraka_u:411_0: saṃsvādabhedastu ekasyām api madhurajātāv ikṣukṣīraguḍādigataḥ pratyakṣameva bhedo dṛśyate sa tu saṃsvādabhedaḥ svasaṃvedya
GS40caraka_u:411_1: eva yaduktam ikṣukṣīraguḍādīnāṃ mādhuryasyāntaraṃ mahat // bhedastathāpi nākhyātuṃ sarasvatyāpi śakyate iti // 18]
GS40caraka_u:412: ṣaḍeva rasā ityuvāca bhagavānātreyaḥ punarvasuḥ madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭutiktakaṣāyāḥ /
GS40caraka_u:413_0: teṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāṃ yonirudakaṃ chedanopaśamane dve karmaṇī tayor miśrībhāvāt sādhāraṇatvaṃ svādvasvādutā bhaktiḥ hitāhitau
GS40caraka_u:413_1: prabhāvau pañcamahābhūtavikārās tv āśrayāḥ prakṛtivikṛtivicāradeśakālavaśāḥ teṣvāśrayeṣu dravyasaṃjñakeṣu guṇā gurulaghuśītoṣṇasnigdharūkṣādyāḥ
GS40caraka_u:413_2: kṣaraṇāt kṣāraḥ nāsau rasaḥ dravyaṃ tadanekarasasamutpannam anekarasaṃ kaṭukalavaṇabhūyiṣṭham anekendriyārthasamanvitaṃ karaṇābhinirvṛttam
GS40caraka_u:413_3: avyaktībhāvastu khalu rasānāṃ prakṛtau bhavatyanurase 'nurasasamanvite vā dravye aparisaṃkhyeyatvaṃ punas teṣām āśrayādīnāṃ
GS40caraka_u:413_4: bhāvānāṃ viśeṣāparisaṃkhyeyatvānna yuktam ekaiko 'pi hy eṣām āśrayādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ viśeṣān āśrayate viśeṣāparisaṃkhyeyatvāt
GS40caraka_u:414: parasārasaṃsṛṣṭabhūyiṣṭhatvānna caiṣām abhinirvṛtter guṇaprakṛtīnām aparisaṃkhyeyatvaṃ bhavati tasmānna saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ rasānāṃ karmopadiśanti buddhimantaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:415: taccaiva kāraṇamapekṣamāṇāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāṃ paraspareṇāsaṃsṛṣṭānāṃ lakṣaṇapṛthaktvam upadekṣyāmaḥ [{Āyurvedadīpikā}
GS40caraka_u:418_0: yoniḥ ādhārakāraṇaṃ kāryakāraṇayośca bhedāt siddha udakādrasabhedaḥ pratyakṣa eveti bhāvaḥ kṣitivyatiriktam udakameva yathā
GS40caraka_u:418_1: rasayonistathā rasanārtho rasastasya ityādau vivṛtameva dīrghaṃjīvitīye tayormiśrībhāvāditi karmaṇor amūrtayor miśrībhāvānupapattau
GS40caraka_u:421: tena yo yamicchati sa tasya svādurasvāduritara iti puruṣāpekṣau dharmau na rasabhedakāryāv ityarthaḥ // 8
GS40caraka_u:422: pañcamahābhūtetyādau tuśabdo 'vadhāraṇe tena āśrayā eva na rasā ityarthaḥ
GS40caraka_u:423: kiṃbhūtā bhaumādayo bhūtavikārā āśrayā ityāha prakṛtivikṛtivicāradeśakālavaśā iti vaśaśabdo 'dhīnārthaḥ sa ca prakṛtyādibhiḥ pratyekaṃ yojyaḥ // 10
GS40caraka_u:424_0: tatra prakṛtivaśā yathā mudgāḥ kaṣāyā madhurāśca santaḥ prakṛtyā laghavaḥ etaddhi lāghavaṃ na rasavaśaṃ tathāhi sati kaṣāyamadhuratvād
GS40caraka_u:424_1: gurutvaṃ syāt vikṛtivaśaṃ ca vrīher lājānāṃ laghutvaṃ tathā saktusiddhapiṇḍakānāṃ ca gurutvaṃ vicāraṇā vicāro dravyāntarasaṃyoga
GS40caraka_u:424_2: ityarthaḥ tena vicāraṇāvaśaṃ yathā madhusarpiṣī saṃyukte viṣaṃ tathā viṣaṃ cāgadasaṃyuktaṃ svakāryavyatiriktakāryakāri deśo
GS40caraka_u:424_3: dvividho bhūmir āturaśca tatra bhūmau śvetakāpotī valmīkādhirūḍhā viṣaharī tathā himavati bheṣajāni mahāguṇāni bhavanti śarīradeśe
GS40caraka_u:425: ityādi kālavaśaṃ tu yathā mūlakamadhikṛtyoktaṃ tadbālaṃ doṣaharaṃ vṛddhaṃ tridoṣaṃ tathā yathartupuṣpaphalam ādadīta ityādi // 11
GS40caraka_u:426: atra caikaprakaraṇoktā ye 'nuktās te cakārāt svabhāvādiṣvevāntarbhāvanīyāḥ
GS40caraka_u:427: yaduktaṃ caraḥ śarīrāvayavāḥ svabhāvo dhātavaḥ kriyāḥ // 13
GS40caraka_u:428: liṅgaṃ pramāṇaṃ saṃskāro mātrā cāsmin parīkṣyate iti // 14
GS40caraka_u:429_0: tatra caraśarīrāvayavadhātūnāṃ deśena grahaṇaṃ mātrā vicāre praviśati śeṣaṃ svabhāve tathā rasavimāne vakṣyamāṇaṃ cātrāpraviṣṭam
GS40caraka_u:429_1: āhāraviśeṣāyatanam antarbhāvanīyaṃ yathāsambhavam // snigdharūkṣādyā ityatrādigrahaṇenānuktā api tīkṣṇamṛdvādayo na rasāḥ
GS40caraka_u:430_0: kṣaraṇāt adhogamanakriyāyogāt kṣāro dravyaṃ nāsau rasaḥ rasasya hi niṣkriyasya kriyānupapannetyarthaḥ kṣaraṇaṃ ca kṣārasya
GS40caraka_u:430_1: pānīyayuktasyādhogamanena vadanti hi laukikāḥ kṣāraṃ srāvayāmaḥ iti śāstraṃ ca chittvā chittvāśayāt kṣāraḥ kṣaratvāt kṣārayatyadhaḥ
GS40caraka_u:431_0: hetvantaram āha dravyaṃ tadanekarasotpannam iti anekarasebhyo muṣkakāpāmārgādibhya utpannam anekarasotpannaṃ yataś cānekarasotpannam
GS40caraka_u:435_0: kṣāro hi sparśena gandhena cānvitaḥ tena dravyaṃ rase hi guṇe na sparśo nāpi gandha iti bhāvaḥ hetvantaramāha karaṇābhinirvṛttamiti
GS40caraka_u:435_1: karaṇena bhasmaparisrāvaṇādinābhinirvṛttaṃ kṛtam ityarthaḥ na raso 'nena prakāreṇa kriyata iti bhāvaḥ // 24
GS40caraka_u:437: avyaktībhāva ityabhūtatadbhāve cvipratyayena rasānāṃ madhurādīnāṃ vyaktānām eva kvacidādhāre 'vyaktatvaṃ nānyo madhurādibhyo 'vyaktarasa
GS40caraka_u:442_0: avyaktatvaṃ ca rasasāmānyamātropalabdhir madhurādiviśeṣaśūnyā sā ca jale bhavati yata uktaṃ jalaguṇakathane suśrute vyaktarasatā
GS40caraka_u:442_1: rasadoṣaḥ iti ihāpi ca avyaktarasaṃ ca iti vakṣyati loke'pi cāvyaktarasaṃ dravyamāsvādya vaktāro vadanti jalasyevāsya raso
GS40caraka_u:444: yathā dūrād avijñāyamānaviśeṣavarṇe vastuni rūpasāmānyapratītir bhavati na śuklatvādiviśeṣabuddhiḥ tathānurase 'vyaktībhāvo bhavati pradhānaṃ vyaktaṃ
GS40caraka_u:446: yaduktaṃ rūkṣaḥ kaṣāyānuraso madhuraḥ kaphapittahā iti // 33
GS40caraka_u:447: anurasasamanvita iti sarvānurasayukte yathā viṣe vacanaṃ hi uṣṇam anirdeśyarasam ityādi //
GS40caraka_u:448: kiṃvā aṇurasasamanvite iti pāṭhas tena aṇurasenaikena maricena śarkarāpānake kaṭutvam avyaktaṃ syāt // 35
GS40caraka_u:450: teṣāmiti rasānām aparisaṃkhyeyatvaṃ na yuktam āśrayādīnāṃ bhāvānāmiti āśrayaguṇakarmasaṃsvādānām viśeṣāparisaṃkhyeyatvāditi āśrayādibhedasyāparisaṃkhyeyatvāt // 37
GS40caraka_u:452: eṣāmāśrayaguṇakarmasaṃsvādānāṃ viśeṣān ekaiko 'pi madhurādir āśrayate na
GS40caraka_u:453: ca tasmād āśrayādibhedād anyatvam āśritasya madhurāder bhavati // 39
GS40caraka_u:454: evaṃ manyate yadyapi śālimudgaghṛtakṣīrādayo madhurasyāśrayā bhinnāḥ tathāpi tatra madhuratvajātyākrānta eka eva raso bhavati balākākṣīrakārpāsādiṣu śuklavarṇa iva // 40
GS40caraka_u:455_0: tathā guṇānāṃ gurupicchilasnigdhādīnāmanyatve 'pi karmaṇāṃ vā rasādivardhanāyurjananavarṇakaratvādīnāṃ bhinnatve satyapi
GS40caraka_u:455_1: na madhurarasasyānyatvaṃ yata eka eva madhuras tattadguṇayukto bhavati tatkarmakārī ceti ko virodhaḥ // 41
GS40caraka_u:456: tathā madhurasyāvāntarāsvādabhede 'pi madhuratvajātyanatikramaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇāvāntarabhede yathā kṛṣṇatvānatikramaḥ // 42
GS40caraka_u:457: nanu maivaṃ bhavatv aparisaṃkhyeyatvaṃ rasānāṃ parasparasaṃyogāt tu ya āsvādaviśeṣaḥ sa kāryaviśeṣakaro 'pi na hi yanmadhurāmlena kriyate tanmadhureṇa vāmlena vā śakyam atastena
GS40caraka_u:459_0: saṃsṛṣṭam iti bhāve ktaḥ tena parasparasaṃsargabhūyiṣṭhatvād eṣāṃ madhurādīnām abhinirvṛtterna guṇaprakṛtīnām asaṃkhyeyatvam
GS40caraka_u:459_1: iti yojanā ayamarthaḥ yadyapi rasāḥ parasparasaṃsargeṇātibhūyasā yuktāḥ santo
GS40caraka_u:460_0: 'bhinirvṛttā dvirasādau dravye bhavanti tathāpi na teṣāṃ guṇā gurulaghvādayaḥ prakṛtayo vā madhurādīnāṃ yā yā āyuṣyatvarasābhivardhakatvādyās
GS40caraka_u:460_1: tā asaṃkhyeyā bhavanti kiṃtu ya eva madhurādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ guṇāḥ prakṛtayaśca uddiṣṭāsta eva miśrā bhavanti //
GS40caraka_u:461: kiṃvā guṇaprakṛtīnāmiti madhurādiṣaḍguṇasvarūpāṇām ityarthaḥ tena rasasya rasāntarasaṃsarge doṣāṇāmiva doṣāntarasaṃsarge rasānāṃ nāparisaṃkhyeyatvam ityarthaḥ // 45
GS40caraka_u:462: prakṛtiśabdena karma vocyate tena guṇakarmaṇām ityarthaḥ // 46
GS40caraka_u:464: yata eva heto rasānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ nānye guṇakarmaṇī bhavataḥ ata eva saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ rasānāṃ pṛthakkarma śāstrāntare 'pi noktam ityāha tasmād
GS40caraka_u:466: karmaśabdeneha gauravalāghavādikārakā gurutvādayo rasaraktādijananādayaś cāpi boddhavyāḥ //
GS40caraka_u:467: na kevalam anyaśāstrakārai rasānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ karma nopadiṣṭaṃ kiṃtu vayamapi nopadekṣyāma ityāha taccaivetyādi // 50
GS40caraka_u:470: tatra lakṣyate yena tallakṣaṇam atastu madhuro rasaḥ ityādinā granthena tathā snehanaprīṇanahlādana ityādinā ca yadvācyaṃ tat sarvaṃ gṛhyate // 53
GS40caraka_u:471: kiṃvā lakṣaṇaśabdena madhuro rasa ityādigranthavācyaṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate pṛthaktvaṃ ca rasabhedajñānārthaṃ yad vakṣyati snehanaprīṇana ityādi tad gṛhyate // 54]
GS40caraka_u:472: agre tu tāvad dravyabhedam abhipretya kiṃcid abhidhāsyāmaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:473: sarvaṃ dravyaṃ pāñcabhautikamasminnarthe taccetanāvadacenaṃ ca tasya guṇāḥ śabdādayo gurvādayaś ca dravāntāḥ karma pañcavidhamuktaṃ vamanādi //
GS40caraka_u:476: raseṣu vācyeṣu dravyabhedam abhipretya pratipādanīyatayā parigṛhya rasānāṃ dravyajñānādhīnajñānatvād dravyābhidhānam agre kṛtam ityarthaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:477: kiṃciditi āyurvedopayogidravyasvarūpaṃ na sarvam aprasaṅgadoṣād iti bhāvaḥ
GS40caraka_u:480: dravāntā iti vacanena pūrvoktān viṃśatiguṇān āha // 5
GS40caraka_u:481_0: atra ca paratvāparatvādīnām ihānabhidhānena cikitsāyāṃ paratvādīnām aprādhānyaṃ darśayati ye 'pi tatrāpi yuktisaṃyogaparimāṇasaṃskārābhyāsā
GS40caraka_u:481_1: atyarthacikitsopayogino 'pi na te pārthivādidravyāṇāṃ śabdādivat sāṃsiddhikāḥ kiṃ tarhy ādheyāḥ ata iha naisargikaguṇakathane
GS40caraka_u:487: bahulaśabdo gurvādibhiḥ pratyekaṃ sambadhyate kiṃvā gandhenaiva yato gandhaguṇabahulā pṛthivyeva bhavati ata eva dravyāntaralakṣaṇe 'pi
GS40caraka_u:488: vaiśeṣikaguṇo 'nta eva paṭhyate rasaguṇabahulāni ityādi tena tatrāpi
GS40caraka_u:494: prabhā varṇaprakāśinī dīptiḥ yaduktaṃ varṇamākrāmati chāyā prabhā varṇaprakāśikā ityādi //
GS40caraka_u:497: atrākāśabāhulyaṃ dravyasya pṛthivyādibhūtāntarālpatvena bhūrivyaktākāśatvena ca jñeyaṃ yadeva bhūriśuṣiraṃ tannābhasaṃ kiṃvā ākāśaguṇabahulatvena nābhasaṃ dravyam ityucyate // 9]
GS40caraka_u:498: anenopadeśena nānauṣadhibhūtaṃ jagati kiṃcid dravyam upalabhyate tāṃ tāṃ yuktim arthaṃ ca taṃ tam abhipretya // Car_1,26.12
GS40caraka_u:500: aneneti pratiniyatadravyaguṇopadeśena yat pārthivādi dravyaṃ yadguṇaṃ tadguṇe dehe saṃpādye tad bheṣajaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:501: tacca pārthivādi dravyaṃ na sarvathā na ca sarvasmin vyādhau bheṣajamityāha tāṃ tāṃ yuktim ityādi // 2
GS40caraka_u:502: yuktim iti upāyam arthamiti prayojanam abhipretyeti adhikṛtya tena kenacidupāyena kvacit prayojane kiṃcid dravyamauṣadhaṃ bhavati na sarvatra // 3
GS40caraka_u:503_0: tena yaducyate vairodhikānāṃ sarvadāpathyatvena nānauṣadhaṃ dravyam iti vaco virodhi tanna bhavati vairodhikāni hi saṃyogasaṃskāradeśakālādyapekṣāṇi
GS40caraka_u:503_1: bhavanti vairodhikasaṃyogādyabhāve tu pathyānyapi kvacit syuḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:504: yānyapi sarvadāpi svabhāvādeva viṣamandakādīnyapathyāni tānyapy upāyayuktāni kvacit pathyāni bhavanti yathā udare viṣasya tilaṃ dadyāt ityādi // 5
GS40caraka_u:505: yattu tṛṇapāṃśuprabhṛtīni nopayujyante ato na tāni bheṣajānītyucyate tanna teṣāmapi bheṣajasvedādyupāyatvena bheṣajatvāt // 6]
GS40caraka_u:506_0: na tu kevalaṃ guṇaprabhāvādeva dravyāṇi kārmukāṇi bhavanti dravyāṇi hi dravyaprabhāvād guṇaprabhāvād dravyaguṇaprabhāvāc
GS40caraka_u:506_1: ca tasmiṃstasmin kāle tattadadhikaraṇam āsādya tāṃ tāṃ ca yuktimarthaṃ ca taṃ tamabhipretya yat kurvanti tat karma yena kurvanti
GS40caraka_u:506_2: tadvīryaṃ yatra kurvanti tadadhikaraṇaṃ yadā kurvanti sa kālaḥ yathā kurvanti sa upāyaḥ yat sādhayanti tat phalam
GS40caraka_u:508: pārthivādidravyāṇāṃ gurukharādiguṇayogād bheṣajatvam uktaṃ tena guṇaprabhāvādeva bheṣajaṃ syāditi śaṅkāṃ nirasyann āha na tu kevalam ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:509: dravyaprabhāvād yathā dantyā virecakatvaṃ tathā maṇīnāṃ viṣādihantṛtvam ityādi // 2
GS40caraka_u:510: guṇaprabhāvādyathā jvare tiktako rasaḥ śīte 'gnir ityādi // 3
GS40caraka_u:511: dravyaguṇaprabhāvād yathā kṛṣṇājinasyoparīti atrāpi kṛṣṇatvaṃ guṇo'jinaṃ
GS40caraka_u:512: ca dravyamabhipretaṃ yathā vā maṇḍalair jātarūpasya tasyā eva payaḥ śṛtam tatra maṇḍalaguṇayuktasyaiva jātarūpasya kārmukatvam // 4
GS40caraka_u:514: tāṃ tāṃ yuktimāsādyeti tāṃ tāṃ yojanāṃ prāpya // 6
GS40caraka_u:515_0: yat kurvantītyādāv udāharaṇaṃ yathā śirovirecanadravyāṇi yacchirovirecanaṃ kurvanti tac chirovirecanaṃ karma yenoṣṇatvādikāraṇena
GS40caraka_u:515_1: śirovirecanaṃ kurvanti tadvīryaṃ vīryaṃ śaktiḥ sā ca dravyasya guṇasya vā yatra śirovirecanaṃ kurvanti tadadhikaraṇaṃ śiraḥ
GS40caraka_u:515_2: nānyatrādhikaraṇe śirovirecanadravyaṃ prabhavatītyarthaḥ yadeti vasantādau śirogauravādiyukte ca kāle etenākāle śīte śirovirecanaṃ
GS40caraka_u:515_3: stabdhatvānna kārmukaṃ kiṃtu svakāla eva yathā yena prakāreṇa pradhamanāvapīḍanādinā tathā prasāritāṅgamuttānaṃ śayane saṃstarāstṛte //
GS40caraka_u:516: īṣat pralambaśirasaṃ saṃveśya cāvṛtekṣaṇam ityādinā vidhinā kurvanti sa upāyaḥ yat sādhayanti śirogauravaśūlādyuparamaṃ tat phalaṃ phalam uddeśyam // 8
GS40caraka_u:517: karma kāryaṃ sādhanam uddeśyaṃ phalaṃ sādhyaṃ yathā yāganiṣpādyo dharmaḥ kāryatayā karma tajjanyastu svargādir uddeśyaḥ phalam evaṃ vamanādiṣvapi karmādhikaraṇādyunneyam // 9]
GS40caraka_u:518: bhedaś caiṣāṃ triṣaṣṭividhavikalpo dravyadeśakālaprabhāvād bhavati tam upadekṣyāmaḥ // Car_1,26.14
GS40caraka_u:520: samprati dravyam abhidhāya vikṛtānāṃ rasānām eva bhedam āha bhedaś caiṣām ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:521_0: prabhāvaśabdo dravyadeśakālaiḥ pratyekaṃ yujyate tatra dravyaprabhāvād yathā somaguṇātirekān madhuraḥ ityādi deśaprabhāvād
GS40caraka_u:521_1: yathā himavati drākṣādāḍimādīni madhurāṇi bhavantyanyatrāmlānītyādi kālaprabhāvādyathā bālāmraṃ sakaṣāyaṃ taruṇamamlaṃ pakvaṃ
GS40caraka_u:521_2: madhuraṃ tathā hemante oṣadhyo madhurā varṣāsv amlā ityādi // 2
GS40caraka_u:522: agnisaṃyogādayo ye 'nye rasahetavas te 'pi kāle dravye vāntarbhāvanīyāḥ //
GS40caraka_u:524: yānti pañcadaśaitāni dravyāṇi dvirasāni tu // Car_1,26.15
GS40caraka_u:527_0: tatra svādoramlādiyogāt pañca śeṣair iti āditvenopayuktād anyaiḥ tenāmlasya lavaṇādiyogāc catvāri evaṃ lavaṇasya kaṭvādiyogāt
GS40caraka_u:527_1: trīṇi kaṭukasya tiktakaṣāyayogād dve tiktasya kaṣāyayogād ekam evaṃ pañcadaśa dvirasāni // 2]
GS40caraka_u:529: madhurasya tathāmlasya lavaṇasya kaṭos tathā // Car_1,26.16
GS40caraka_u:533_0: madhurasyāmlādirasacatuṣṭayena pṛthag ityekaikaśo yuktasya śeṣairlavaṇādibhir yogo bhavati tatra madhurasyāmlayuktasya śeṣalavaṇādiyogāc
GS40caraka_u:533_1: catvāri tathā madhurasya lavaṇayuktasya kaṭvādiyogāt trīṇi tathā kaṭuyuktasya tiktādiyogād dve tathā tiktayuktasya kaṣāyayogād
GS40caraka_u:534: evamamlasyādisthitasya lavaṇayuktasya kaṭvādiyogāt trīṇi tathā kaṭukayuktasya śeṣābhyāṃ yogād dve evaṃ tiktayuktasya kaṣāyayogād ekam evam amlasya ṣaṭ // 3
GS40caraka_u:535: anenaiva nyāyena lavaṇasya trīṇi kaṭoś caikameva evaṃ militvā trirasāni viṃśatiḥ // 4]
GS40caraka_u:536: vakṣyante tu catuṣkeṇa dravyāṇi daśa pañca ca // Car_1,26.17
GS40caraka_u:540: yuktau śeṣaiḥ pṛthagyogaṃ yātaḥ svādūṣaṇau tathā // Car_1,26.19
GS40caraka_u:542: yātaḥ śeṣaiḥ pṛthagyogaṃ śeṣairamlakaṭū tathā // Car_1,26.20
GS40caraka_u:545: catūrase svādvamlāv ādisthitau lavaṇādibhir ekaikaśyena yuktau śeṣaiḥ kaṭvādibhir yogāt ṣaḍ bhavanti // 1
GS40caraka_u:546: svādulavaṇau sahitau ādisthitau kaṭvādibhiriti kaṭutiktābhyāṃ pṛthagyuktau śeṣair iti tiktakaṣāyābhyāṃ teneha bahuvacanaṃ jātau boddhavyam evaṃ trīṇi
GS40caraka_u:549: amlalavaṇau saṃyuktau kaṭunā sahitau śeṣābhyāṃ yogād dve tathāmlalavaṇau tiktayuktau śeṣayogād ekam // 5
GS40caraka_u:554: ṣaṭ caivaikarasāni syur ekaṃ ṣaḍrasameva tu /
GS40caraka_u:557: atra ca rasānāṃ guṇatvenaikasmin dravye samavāyo yogaśabdenocyate // 2]
GS40caraka_u:560: rasāstaratamābhyāṃ tāṃ saṃkhyām atipatanti hi // Car_1,26.23
GS40caraka_u:562: rasasaṃsargasya prakārāntareṇāsaṃkhyeyatām āha triṣaṣṭiḥ syād ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:564: atra ca triṣaṣṭyātmakarase rasānurasakalpanā nāsti kevale madhurādau tadabhāvāt tena yathāsambhavaṃ saptapañcāśatsaṃyogaviṣayaṃ rasānurasakalpanaṃ jñeyam // 3
GS40caraka_u:566: prakārāntareṇāpy asaṃkhyeyatām āha rasās taratamābhyām ityādi // 5
GS40caraka_u:568: kiṃvā rasānurasatvenaiva yāsaṃkhyeyatā tatraivāyaṃ hetuḥ rasās taratamābhyāmityādiḥ // 7]
GS40caraka_u:574: tatra yogyatvād iti tatra svasthāturahitacikitsāprayoge 'natisaṃkṣepavistararūpatayā hitatvād ityarthaḥ // 2]
GS40caraka_u:575: kvacideko rasaḥ kalpyaḥ saṃyuktāś ca rasāḥ kvacit /
GS40caraka_u:578: rasān ekaikaśo vāpi kalpayanti gadān prati // Car_1,26.26
GS40caraka_u:582: etadeva saṃyuktāsaṃyuktarasakalpanaṃ bhinnarasadravyamelakād vānekarasaikadravyaprayogād ekarasadravyaprayogādvā bhavatīti darśayannāha dravyāṇītyādi // 3
GS40caraka_u:583: dvirasādīni utpattisiddhadvirasatrirasādīni dvirasaṃ yathā kaṣāyamadhuro mudgaḥ trirasaṃ yathā madhurāmlakaṣāyaṃ ca viṣṭambhi guru śītalam // 4
GS40caraka_u:584_0: pittaśleṣmaharaṃ bhavyam ityādi catūrasas tilaḥ yad uktaṃ snigdhoṣṇamadhuras tiktaḥ kaṣāyaḥ kaṭukas tilaḥ pañcarasaṃ tv āmalakaṃ
GS40caraka_u:584_1: harītakī ca śivā pañcarasā ityādivacanāt vyaktaṣaḍrasaṃ tu dravyam ihānuktaṃ viṣaṃ tv avyaktaṣaḍrasasaṃyuktaṃ hārīte tv eṇamāṃsaṃ
GS40caraka_u:586: tathā saṃyuktāṃśca rasāniti ekaikarasādidravyamelakāt saṃyuktān rasān ekaikaśaḥ kalpayanti prayojayanti // 7
GS40caraka_u:587_0: gadān pratīti prādhānyena tena svasthavṛtte 'pi boddhavyaṃ kiṃvā dvirasādibhedo gada eva svasthe tu sarvarasaprayoga eva
GS40caraka_u:587_1: yaduktaṃ samasarvarasaṃ sātmyaṃ samadhātoḥ praśasyate iti evaṃ ca vyākhyāne sati kvacideko rasa ityādinā samamasya na paunaruktyam
GS40caraka_u:588_0: kiṃvā kvacid eko rasaḥ ityādinā svamatam uktam atraivārthe dravyāṇi dvirasādīni ityādinācāryāntarasammatiṃ darśayati ata
GS40caraka_u:590: na sa muhyed vikārāṇāṃ hetuliṅgopaśāntiṣu // Car_1,26.27
GS40caraka_u:593: atra rasavikalpajñānādeva vyādhihetudravyajñānaṃ kṛtsnamavaruddhaṃ rasajñānenaiva prāyaḥ sakaladravyaguṇasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt // 2
GS40caraka_u:594: doṣavikalpajñānācca liṅgajñānaṃ yāvaddhi liṅgaṃ tat sarvaṃ doṣavikalpasambaddham // 3
GS40caraka_u:595: rasadoṣavikalpajñānāt tu bheṣajajñānaṃ yato rasataḥ svarūpajñānaṃ bheṣajadravyasya doṣataśca bheṣajaprayogaviṣayavijñānam // 4
GS40caraka_u:596: kiṃvā rasavikalpāc ca tathā doṣavikalpāc ca hetvādijñānaṃ pṛthageva vaktavyaṃ rasabhedāddhi tatkāryaṃ liṅgamapi jñāyate hetubheṣajavijñānaṃ tu
GS40caraka_u:597_0: rasabhedavijñānādeva vaktavyaṃ yato rasabhedavad dravyameva vikārāṇāṃ heturbheṣajaṃ ca bhavatīti evaṃ doṣabhedaṃ jñātvā ca
GS40caraka_u:597_1: tasya samānaṃ hetuṃ pratyeti doṣavirodhi ca dravyaṃ bheṣajamiti tad yuktam uktaṃ na sa muhyedvikārāṇāṃ hetuliṅgopaśāntiṣviti //
GS40caraka_u:598: vyaktaḥ śuṣkasya cādau ca raso dravyasya lakṣyate /
GS40caraka_u:599: viparyayeṇānuraso raso nāsti hi saptamaḥ // Car_1,26.28
GS40caraka_u:602_0: śuṣkasya ceti cakārād ārdrasya ca ādau ceti cakārādante ca tena śuṣkasya vārdrasya vā prathamajihvāsambandhe vāsvādānte vā
GS40caraka_u:602_1: yo vyaktatvena madhuro 'yam amlo 'yam ityādinā vikalpena gṛhyate sa vyaktaḥ yas
GS40caraka_u:603: tūktāvasthācatuṣṭaye 'pi vyakto nopalabhyate kiṃ tarhy avyapadeśyatayā chāyāmātreṇa kāryadarśanena vā mīyate so 'nurasa iti vākyārthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:604: yataśca madhurādaya eva vyaktatvāvyaktatvābhyāṃ rasānurasarūpāḥ ato'vyakto
GS40caraka_u:606: ayaṃ cārthaḥ pūrvaṃ pratiṣiddho 'pyanuguṇaspaṣṭahetuprāptyā punar niṣidhyate // 4
GS40caraka_u:607: anye tv āhuḥ śuṣkasya cetyanena yasya dravyasya śuṣkasya cārdrasya copayogaḥ tatra śuṣkāvasthāyāṃ yo 'vyaktaḥ sa rasa ucyate
GS40caraka_u:608: yastvārdrāvasthāyāṃ vyaktaḥ san śuṣkāvasthāyāṃ nānuyāti nāsau rasaḥ kiṃtv anurasaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:609_0: yathā pippalyā ārdrāyā madhuro raso vyaktaḥ śuṣkāyāstu pippalyāḥ kaṭukaḥ tena kaṭuka eva rasaḥ pippalyāḥ madhurastvanurasaḥ
GS40caraka_u:609_1: yastu drākṣādīnām ārdrāvasthāyāṃ śuṣkāvasthāyāṃ ca madhura eva tatra vipratipattirapi nāsti tena tatra madhura eva rasaḥ
GS40caraka_u:609_2: nityārdraprayojyānāṃ tu kāñjikatakrādīnāmādau vyakto ya upalabhyate rasaḥ anu copalabhyate yaḥ so 'nuraso yuktas tiktatvādiḥ
GS40caraka_u:609_3: tathā ārdrāvasthāyāṃ śuṣkāvasthāviparīto yaḥ pippalyā iva madhuraḥ so 'nurasa iti // 6
GS40caraka_u:610_0: kiṃtv ārdrāpi pippalī madhurarasaiveti paśyāmaḥ yato vakṣyati śleṣmalā madhurā cārdrā gurvī snigdhā ca pippalī iti madhurasya
GS40caraka_u:610_1: tatrānurasatve gurutvaśleṣmakartṛtvāny anupapannāni tena ārdrā pippalī vyaktamadhurarasaiva śuṣkā tu madhurānuraseti yuktam //
GS40caraka_u:611: parāparatve yuktiśca saṃkhyā saṃyoga eva ca /
GS40caraka_u:612: vibhāgaśca pṛthaktvaṃ ca parimāṇamathāpi ca // Car_1,26.29
GS40caraka_u:616: parāparatve yuktiśca yojanā yā tu yujyate // Car_1,26.31
GS40caraka_u:617: saṃkhyā syādgaṇitaṃ yogaḥ saha saṃyoga ucyate /
GS40caraka_u:624: cikitsā yair aviditair na yathāvat pravartate // Car_1,26.35
GS40caraka_u:626: samprati pūrvoktagurvādiguṇātiriktān paratvāparatvādīn daśa guṇān rasadharmatvenopadeṣṭavyānāha paretyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:629_0: tatra deśo maruḥ paraḥ anūpo 'paraḥ kālo visargaḥ paraḥ ādānamaparaḥ vayastaruṇaṃ param aparam itaran mānaṃ ca śarīrasya
GS40caraka_u:629_1: yathā vakṣyamāṇaṃ śarīre paraṃ tato'nyadaparaṃ pākavīryarasāstu ye yasya yoginaste taṃ prati
GS40caraka_u:632_0: kiṃvā paratvāparatve vaiśeṣikokte jñeye tatra deśāpekṣayā saṃnikṛṣṭadeśasambandhinam apekṣya vidūradeśasambandhini paratvaṃ
GS40caraka_u:632_1: saṃnikṛṣṭadeśasambandhini cāparatvaṃ bhavati evaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaviprakṛṣṭakālāpekṣayā ca sthavire paratvaṃ yūni cāparatvaṃ bhavati //
GS40caraka_u:633: vayaḥprabhṛtiṣu paratvāparatvaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ kāladeśakṛtam evehopayogād upacaritam apyabhihitaṃ yato na guṇe mānādau guṇāntarasambhavaḥ // 7
GS40caraka_u:634_0: yuktiścetyādau yojanā doṣādyapekṣayā bheṣajasya samīcīnakalpanā ata evoktaṃ yā tu yujyate yā kalpanā yaugikī bhavati sā tu
GS40caraka_u:634_1: yuktir ucyate ayaugikī tu kalpanāpi satī yuktir nocyate putro 'pyaputravat // 8
GS40caraka_u:639: saheti militānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ yogaḥ prāptirityarthaḥ sahetyanenehākiṃcitkaraṃ parasparasaṃyogaṃ nirākaroti // 13
GS40caraka_u:641: tatra dvaṃdvakarmajo yathā yudhyamānayor meṣayoḥ sarvakarmajo yathā bhāṇḍe prakṣipyamāṇānāṃ māṣāṇāṃ bahulamāṣakriyā yogajaḥ ekakarmajo yathā vṛkṣavāyasayoḥ // 15
GS40caraka_u:645: vibhaktimeva vivṛṇoti viyoga iti saṃyogasya vigamo viyogaḥ // 19
GS40caraka_u:646: tat kiṃ saṃyogābhāva eva viyoga ityāha bhāgaśo graha iti // 20
GS40caraka_u:647: vibhāgaśo vibhaktatvena grahaṇaṃ yato bhavatīti bhāvaḥ tena vibhaktirityeṣā bhāvarūpā pratītir na saṃyogābhāvamātraṃ bhavati kiṃtarhi bhāvarūpavibhāgaguṇayuktā ityarthaḥ // 21
GS40caraka_u:648: pṛthaktvaṃ tu idaṃ dravyaṃ paṭalakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭāt pṛthag ityādikā buddhiryato bhavati tat pṛthaktvaṃ bhavati // 22
GS40caraka_u:650_0: tatra yat sarvathāsaṃyujyamānayoriva meruhimācalayoḥ pṛthaktvam etadasaṃyoga ityanenoktam tathā saṃyujyamānānāmapi pṛthaktvaṃ
GS40caraka_u:650_1: vijātīyānāṃ mahiṣavarāhādīnāṃ tadāha vailakṣaṇyamityādi viśiṣṭalakṣaṇayuktatvalakṣitaṃ vijātīyānāṃ pṛthaktvam ityarthaḥ //
GS40caraka_u:651: tathaikajātīyānāmapy avilakṣaṇānāṃ māṣāṇāṃ pṛthaktvaṃ bhavatītyāha anekateti // 27
GS40caraka_u:652: ekajātīyeṣu hi saṃyukteṣu na vailakṣaṇyaṃ nāpyasaṃyogaḥ atha cānekatā pṛthaktvarūpā bhavatīti bhāvaḥ // 28
GS40caraka_u:653: kiṃvā pṛthaktvaṃ guṇāntaramicchan lokavyavahārārtham asaṃyogavailakṣaṇyānekatārūpameva yathodāhṛtaṃ pṛthaktvaṃ darśayati // 29
GS40caraka_u:655: karaṇaṃ guṇāntarādhāyakatvaṃ saṃskaraṇamityarthaḥ yadvakṣyati saṃskāro hi guṇāntarādhānamucyate iti // 30
GS40caraka_u:657: abhyasanameva lokaprasiddhābhyāṃ paryāyābhyāṃ vivṛṇoti śīlanaṃ satatakriyeti yaṃ lokāḥ śīlanasatatakriyābhyām abhidadhati so 'bhyāsa iti bhāvaḥ // 32
GS40caraka_u:658: ayaṃ ca saṃyogasaṃskāraviśeṣarūpo 'pi viśeṣeṇa cikitsopayuktatvāt pṛthagucyate // 33
GS40caraka_u:659: na yathāvat pravartata iti vacanena śabdādiṣu ca gurvādiṣu ca parādīnāmaprādhānyaṃ sūcayati guṇā guṇāśrayā noktāstasmād rasaguṇān bhiṣak /
GS40caraka_u:662: samprati rasānāṃ parasparasaṃyogo guṇa uktaḥ tathāgre ca snigdhatvādirguṇo vācyaḥ sa ca guṇarūparase na sambhavatīti yathā rasānāṃ guṇanirdeśo boddhavyas tadāha guṇā ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:663: guṇā guṇāśrayā noktā iti dīrghaṃjīvitīye samavāyī tu niśceṣṭaḥ kāraṇaṃ guṇaḥ ityanena // 2
GS40caraka_u:664: rasaguṇāniti rase snigdhādīn guṇān nirdiṣṭān tad rasādhāradravyaguṇān eva vidyāt // 3
GS40caraka_u:665_0: nanu yadi dravyaguṇā eva te tat kimiti rasaguṇatvenocyanta ityāha karturityādi karturiti tantrakartuḥ abhiprāyā iti tatra
GS40caraka_u:665_1: tatropacāreṇa tathā sāmānyaśabdādiprayogeṇa tantrakaraṇabuddhayaḥ sāmānyaśabdopacārādiprayogaś ca prakaraṇādivaśād eva sphuṭatvāt
GS40caraka_u:666: tacca prakaraṇādi ataśca prakṛtaṃ buddhvā ityādau darśayiṣyāmaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:667_0: iha ca dravyaguṇānāṃ raseṣu yadupacaraṇaṃ tasyāyamabhiprāyo yat madhurādinirdeśenaiva snigdhaśītādiguṇā api prāyo madhurādyavyabhicāriṇo
GS40caraka_u:667_1: dravye nirdiṣṭā bhavantīti na madhuratvaṃ nirdiśya snigdhatvādipratipādanaṃ punaḥ pṛthak kriyata iti // 7]
GS40caraka_u:671: abhiprāyapṛthaktve sati yathā grantho boddhavyas tadāha ataś cetyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:672: tatra prakṛtaṃ buddhvā yathā kṣārāḥ kṣīraṃ phalaṃ puṣpam ityatrodbhidagaṇasya prakṛtatvāt kṣīramiti snuhyādikṣīram eva kṣīraśabdena vadet // 2
GS40caraka_u:673: deśāntaraṃ buddhveti yathā śirasi śodhane 'bhidhīyamāne krimivyādhau iti tacchirogatakrimivyādhāv eva bhavati // 3
GS40caraka_u:674: kālāntare yathā vamanakāle 'bhihitaṃ pratigrahāṃś copahārayed iti tatra pratigrahaśabdena pātramucyate na tu grahaṇaṃ pratigrahaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:675: tantrakartur abhiprāyān iti yathoktaṃ raseṣu guṇāropaṇe tad boddhavyam //
GS40caraka_u:678: yadyapi prakṛtādayo 'pi tantrakartur abhiprāyā eva tathāpi yatra prakṛtatvādi na sphuṭaṃ pratīyate tatra tantrakartur abhiprāyatvena boddhavyam // 8]
GS40caraka_u:680: ṣaṭ pañcabhūtaprabhavāḥ saṃkhyātāśca yathā rasāḥ // Car_1,26.38
GS40caraka_u:683: ṣaṭ pañcabhūtaprabhavā iti pañcabhūtaprabhavāḥ santo yathoktena prakāreṇa somaguṇātirekāt ityādinā yathā ṣaṭ saṃkhyātāḥ ṣaṭsaṃkhyāparicchinnā bhavanti tathā vakṣyāmīti yojanā // 2]
GS40caraka_u:685: tāstvantarikṣādbhraśyamānā bhraṣṭāśca pañcamahāguṇasamanvitā jaṅgamasthāvarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ mūrtīr abhiprīṇayanti tāsu mūrtiṣu ṣaḍ abhimūrchanti rasāḥ // Car_1,26.39
GS40caraka_u:687: samprati rasānām ādikāraṇameva tāvad āha saumyā ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:689: bhraśyamānā iti vadatā bhūmisambandhavyatirekeṇāntarīkṣeritaiḥ pṛthivyādiparamāṇvādibhiḥ sambandho rasārambhako bhavatīti darśyate // 3
GS40caraka_u:693: atra cāntarīkṣamudakaṃ rasakāraṇatve pradhānatvāduktaṃ tena kṣitistham api sthāvarajaṅgamotpattau rasakāraṇaṃ bhavatyeva // 7]
GS40caraka_u:694_0: teṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ rasānāṃ somaguṇātirekānmadhuro rasaḥ pṛthivyagnibhūyiṣṭhatvādamlaḥ salilāgnibhūyiṣṭhatvāl lavaṇaḥ vāyvagnibhūyiṣṭhatvātkaṭukaḥ
GS40caraka_u:695_0: evameṣāṃ rasānāṃ ṣaṭtvam upapannaṃ nyūnātirekaviśeṣān mahābhūtānāṃ bhūtānāmiva sthāvarajaṅgamānāṃ nānāvarṇākṛtiviśeṣāḥ ṣaḍṛtukatvācca
GS40caraka_u:697_0: somaguṇātirekāditi atirekaśabdena sarveṣveva raseṣu sarvabhūtasāṃnidhyam asti kvacit tu kasyacid bhūtaguṇasyātirekād rasaviśeṣe
GS40caraka_u:697_1: bhavatīti darśayati etacca madhuraṃ prati abguṇātiriktatvaṃ viśeṣotpattau kāraṇatvena jñeyaṃ yaccādhārakāraṇatvam apāṃ tat
GS40caraka_u:699: lavaṇastu suśrute pṛthivyagnyatirekāt paṭhitaḥ asmiṃś ca virodhe kāryavirodho nāstyeva //
GS40caraka_u:700_0: nanu uṣṇaśītābhyāmagnisalilābhyāṃ kṛtasya lavaṇasyāpy uṣṇaśītatvena bhavitavyaṃ tal lavaṇaṃ katham uṣṇaṃ bhavati naivaṃ yato
GS40caraka_u:700_1: bhūtānām ayaṃ svabhāvo yat kenacit prakāreṇa saṃniviṣṭāḥ kaṃcid guṇam ārabhante na sarvam // 4
GS40caraka_u:701: yathā makuṣṭhake 'dbhir madhuro rasaḥ kriyate na snehaḥ tathā saindhave vahnināpi noṣṇatvam ārabhyate // 5
GS40caraka_u:702: ayaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ saṃniveśo 'dṛṣṭaprabhāvakṛta eva sa ca saṃniveśaḥ kāryadarśanenonneyaḥ //
GS40caraka_u:703: tena yatra kāryaṃ dṛśyate tatra kalpyate yathā lavaṇe uṣṇatvād agnir viṣyanditvācca jalamanumīyate āgamavedanīyaścāyamartho nātrāsmadvidhānāṃ kalpanāḥ prasaranti // 8
GS40caraka_u:704: etena yaducyate toyavat pṛthivyādayo'pi kimiti pṛthagrasāntaraṃ na
GS40caraka_u:705: kurvanti tathā toyavātādisaṃyogādibhyaḥ kimiti rasāntarāṇi notpadyanta iti tadapi bhūtasvabhāvāparyanuyogād eva pratyuktam // 9
GS40caraka_u:706: iha ca kāraṇatvaṃ bhūtānāṃ rasasya madhuratvādiviśeṣa eva nimittakāraṇarūpam ucyate tena nīrasānām api hi dahanādīnāṃ kāraṇatvamupapannam eva vyutpāditam // 10
GS40caraka_u:708: rasānāṃ ṣaṭtvaṃ mahābhūtānāṃ nyūnātirekaviśeṣāt somaguṇātirekapṛthivyagnyatirekādeḥ ṣaḍutpādakāraṇādupapannaṃ ṣaḍbhyaḥ kāraṇebhyaḥ ṣaṭ kāryāṇi bhavantīti yuktameveti bhāvaḥ // 12
GS40caraka_u:709: bhūtānāṃ yathā nānāvarṇākṛtiviśeṣā mahābhūtānāṃ nyūnātirekaviśeṣāt tathā rasānām apīti //
GS40caraka_u:710: bhūtānāṃ yathoktānām atirekaviśeṣahetum āha ṣaḍṛtukatvād ityādi // 14
GS40caraka_u:711_0: ṣaḍṛtukatvena kālo nānāhemantādirūpatayā kaṃcidbhūtaviśeṣaṃ kvacidvardhayati sa cātmakāryaṃ rasaṃ puṣṭaṃ karoti yathā hemantakāle
GS40caraka_u:711_1: somaguṇātireko bhavati śiśire vāyvākāśātirekaḥ evaṃ tasyāśitīyoktarasotpādakrameṇa vasantādāv api bhūtotkarṣo jñeyaḥ ṣaḍṛtukācceti
GS40caraka_u:712: ca tena hemantādāv api rasāntarotpādaḥ kvacidvastuny upapanno bhavati //
GS40caraka_u:713: yadyapi ca ṛtubhede'pi bhūtotkarṣaviśeṣa eva kāraṇaṃ yaduktaṃ tāv etāv
GS40caraka_u:714: arkavāyū ityādi tathāpi bījāṅkurakāryakāraṇabhāvavat saṃsārānāditayaiva bhūtaviśeṣartvoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo vācyaḥ // 16]
GS40caraka_u:715_0: tatrāgnimārutātmakā rasāḥ prāyeṇordhvabhājaḥ lāghavādutplavanatvāc ca vāyorūrdhvajvalanatvācca vahneḥ salilapṛthivyātmakāstu
GS40caraka_u:715_1: prāyeṇādhobhājaḥ pṛthivyā gurutvān nimnagatvāc codakasya vyāmiśrātmakāḥ punar ubhayatobhājaḥ // Car_1,26.41
GS40caraka_u:720: plavanatvāditi gatimattvāt yadyapi gatiradho'pi syāt tathāpi laghutvaparigatagatir iha vāyorūrdhvam eva gamanaṃ karoti yathā śālmalītulānām // 4
GS40caraka_u:721: hetvantaram āha ūrdhvajvalanatvāc cāgneriti agner apyūrdhvagatitvād ityarthaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:725: yathādravyamiti yadyasya rasasya dravyam ādhāras tadanatikrameṇa // 1
GS40caraka_u:726: etena rasānāṃ guṇakarmaṇī rasādhāre dravye boddhavye iti darśayati // 2]
GS40caraka_u:728_1: tvacyaḥ keśyaḥ kaṇṭhyo balyaḥ prīṇano jīvanastarpaṇo bṛṃhaṇaḥ sthairyakaraḥ kṣīṇakṣatasaṃdhānakaro
GS40caraka_u:729: ghrāṇamukhakaṇṭhauṣṭhajihvāprahlādano dāhamūrchāpraśamanaḥ ṣaṭpadapipīlikānām iṣṭatamaḥ snigdhaḥ śīto guruśca /
GS40caraka_u:732: madhura ādāv ucyate praśastāyuṣyādiguṇatayā prāyaḥ prāṇipriyatayā ca // 2
GS40caraka_u:736: kṣīṇasya saṃdhānakaro dhātupoṣakatvena kiṃvā kṣīṇaścāsau kṣataśceti tena kṣīṇakṣatasya uraḥkṣataṃ saṃdadhāti // 6
GS40caraka_u:738: yaduktaṃ mūtre 'bhidhāvanti pipīlikāśca iti tathā riṣṭe vakṣyati yasmin
GS40caraka_u:739: gṛdhnanti makṣikāḥ iti anena ca madhuratvaṃ jñāyate // 8
GS40caraka_u:740: akṣyāmayenaivābhiṣyande labdhe viśeṣopādānārthaṃ punarvacanaṃ kiṃvā abhiṣyando nāsādiṣvapi jñeyaḥ // 9]
GS40caraka_u:741: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyarthamupayujyamānaḥ sthaulyaṃ mārdavam ālasyam atisvapnaṃ gauravamanannābhilāṣam
GS40caraka_u:742_1: ityevaṃprabhṛtīn kaphajān vikārānupajanayati amlo raso bhaktaṃ rocayati agniṃ dīpayati dehaṃ bṛṃhayati ūrjayati mano bodhayati
GS40caraka_u:742_2: indriyāṇi dṛḍhīkaroti balaṃ vardhayati vātamanulomayati hṛdayaṃ tarpayati āsyamāsrāvayati bhuktamapakarṣayati kledayati jarayati
GS40caraka_u:745: bhuktam apakarṣayatīti sārayati kledayati tathā jarayati bhuktameva // 2
GS40caraka_u:746: avamūtritaṃ mūtraviṣairjantubhiḥ parisarpitaṃ ca sparśaviśeṣaiḥ kāraṇḍādibhiḥ // 3]
GS40caraka_u:747: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyarthamupayujyamāno dantān harṣayati tarṣayati saṃmīlayatyakṣiṇī saṃvejayati lomāni kaphaṃ vilāpayati
GS40caraka_u:748_0: pittamabhivardhayati raktaṃ dūṣayati māṃsaṃ vidahati kāyaṃ śithilīkaroti kṣīṇakṣatakṛśadurbalānāṃ śvayathum āpādayati api
GS40caraka_u:748_2: paridahati kaṇṭhamuro hṛdayaṃ ca lavaṇo rasaḥ pācanaḥ kledano dīpanaścyāvanaśchedano bhedanas tīkṣṇaḥ saro vikāsy adhaḥsraṃsy
GS40caraka_u:748_3: avakāśakaro vātaharaḥ stambhabandhasaṃghātavidhamanaḥ sarvarasapratyanīkabhūtaḥ āsyamāsrāvayati kaphaṃ viṣyandayati mārgān
GS40caraka_u:748_4: viśodhayati sarvaśarīrāvayavān mṛdūkaroti rocayatyāhāram āhārayogī nātyarthaṃ guruḥ snigdha uṣṇaśca /
GS40caraka_u:752: sarvarasapratyanīkabhūta iti yatra mātrātirikto lavaṇo bhavati tatra nānyo rasa upalakṣyate āhārayogīti āhāre sadā yujyate // 4
GS40caraka_u:755_0: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyartham upayujyamānaḥ pittaṃ kopayati raktaṃ vardhayati tarṣayati mūrchayati tāpayati dārayati kuṣṇāti
GS40caraka_u:755_1: māṃsāni pragālayati kuṣṭhāni viṣaṃ vardhayati śophān sphoṭayati dantāṃścyāvayati puṃstvamupahanti indriyāṇyuparuṇaddhi valipalitakhālityamāpādayati
GS40caraka_u:755_2: api ca lohitapittāmlapittavīsarpavātaraktavicarcikendraluptaprabhṛtīn vikārān upajanayati kaṭuko raso vaktraṃ śodhayati agniṃ
GS40caraka_u:756_1: rocayatyaśanaṃ kaṇḍūrvināśayati vraṇān avasādayati krimīn hinasti māṃsaṃ vilikhati śoṇitasaṃghātaṃ bhinatti bandhāṃśchinatti
GS40caraka_u:756_2: mārgān vivṛṇoti śleṣmāṇaṃ śamayati laghuruṣṇo rūkṣaśca sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyarthamupayujyamāno vipākaprabhāvāt puṃstvamupahanti
GS40caraka_u:757_0: rasavīryaprabhāvānmohayanti glāpayati sādayati karśayati mūrchayati namayati tamayati bhramayati kaṇṭhaṃ paridahati śarīratāpamupajanayati
GS40caraka_u:757_1: balaṃ kṣiṇoti tṛṣṇāṃ janayati api ca vāyvagniguṇabāhulyād bhramadavathukampatodabhedaiś caraṇabhujapārśvapṛṣṭhaprabhṛtiṣu
GS40caraka_u:757_2: mārutajān vikārān upajanayati tikto rasaḥ svayamarociṣṇur apyarocakaghno viṣaghnaḥ krimighno mūrchādāhakaṇḍūkuṣṭhatṛṣṇāpraśamanas
GS40caraka_u:757_3: tvaṅmāṃsayoḥ sthirīkaraṇo jvaraghno dīpanaḥ pācanaḥ stanyaśodhano lekhanaḥ
GS40caraka_u:759: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyarthamupayujyamāno raukṣyāt kharaviṣadasvabhāvāc ca
GS40caraka_u:760_0: rasarudhiramāṃsamedo'sthimajjaśukrāṇy ucchoṣayati srotasāṃ kharatvamupapādayati balam ādatte karśayati glapayati mohayati
GS40caraka_u:760_1: bhramayati vadanam upaśoṣayati aparāṃśca vātavikārānupajanayati kaṣāyo rasaḥ saṃśamanaḥ saṃgrāhī saṃdhānakaraḥ pīḍano ropaṇaḥ
GS40caraka_u:760_2: śoṣaṇaḥ stambhanaḥ śleṣmaraktapittapraśamanaḥ śarīrakledasyopayoktā rūkṣaḥ śīto'laghuśca /
GS40caraka_u:761_0: sa evaṃguṇo'pyeka evātyarthamupayujyamāna āsyaṃ śoṣayati hṛdayaṃ pīḍayati udaram ādhmāpayati vācaṃ nigṛhṇāti srotāṃsy avabadhnāti
GS40caraka_u:761_1: śyāvatvamāpādayati puṃstvamupahanti viṣṭabhya jarāṃ gacchati vātamūtrapurīṣaretāṃsyavagṛhṇāti
GS40caraka_u:762: karśayati glapayati tarṣayati stambhayati kharaviśadarūkṣatvāt pakṣavadhagrahāpatānakārditaprabhṛtīṃś ca vātavikārānupajanayati // 43
GS40caraka_u:764: vipākasya prabhāvo vipākaprabhāvaḥ vipākaśca kaṭūnāṃ kaṭureva rasasya vīryasya ca prabhāvo rasavīryaprabhāvaḥ ayaṃ ca vakṣyamāṇe sarvatra hetuḥ
GS40caraka_u:766: atra ca vipākaprabhāvādikathanam udāharaṇārthaṃ tena madhurādiṣu vipākādikāryam unneyam //
GS40caraka_u:772: ityevamete ṣaḍrasāḥ pṛthaktvenaikatvena vā mātraśaḥ samyagupayujyamānā upakārāya bhavantyadhyātmalokasya apakārakarāḥ punarato'nyathā
GS40caraka_u:773: bhavantyupayujyamānāḥ tān vidvānupakārārthameva mātraśaḥ samyagupayojayediti // Car_1,26.44
GS40caraka_u:781: śītaṃ vīryeṇa yad dravyaṃ madhuraṃ rasapākayoḥ /
GS40caraka_u:782: tayoramlaṃ yaduṣṇaṃ ca yaddravyaṃ kaṭukaṃ tayoḥ // Car_1,26.45
GS40caraka_u:784: samprati rasadvāreṇaiva dravyāṇāṃ vīryam āha śītamityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:785_0: yaddravyaṃ rase pāke ca madhuraṃ tacchītaṃ vīryeṇa jñeyaṃ tathā tayoriti rasapākayor yadamlaṃ dravyaṃ taduṣṇaṃ vīryeṇa tathā
GS40caraka_u:785_1: yacca dravyaṃ tayoriti rasapākayoḥ kaṭukam uktaṃ taccoṣṇaṃ vīryeṇa bhavati iti śeṣaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:786: kiṃvā yaccoṣṇaṃ kaṭukaṃ tayoḥ iti pāṭhaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:787_0: tatra yadrasato madhuraṃ tad vīryataḥ śītamiti vaktavye yad rasapākayor iti karoti tan madhurarasocitapākasyaiva madhuradravyasya
GS40caraka_u:790: yathā payo yathā sarpir yathā vā cavyacitrakau /
GS40caraka_u:793: teṣām iti madhurapākādīnāṃ rasopadeśeneti rasamātrakathanenaiva yato vipāko 'pi rasata eva prāyo jñāyate yad vakṣyati kaṭutiktakaṣāyāṇāṃ vipākaḥ prāyaśaḥ kaṭur ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:795: vīryato'viparītānāṃ rasadvārā vīryajñānaṃ na tu rasaviruddhavīryāṇāṃ mahāpañcamūlādīnāṃ na kevalaṃ rasena kiṃ tarhi pākataśca ya upadekṣyate
GS40caraka_u:796: guṇasaṃgrahaḥ śukrahā baddhaviṇmūtro vipāko vātalaḥ kaṭuḥ ityādinā sa ca vīryato 'viruddhānāṃ vijñeyaḥ yadi tatra vīryaṃ virodhi bhavati tadā
GS40caraka_u:798: kiṃvā pākataścāviparītānāṃ rasopadeśena guṇasaṃgrahaḥ śītoṣṇalakṣaṇo nirdeśyaḥ yasyāstu pippalyāḥ kaṭukāyā api viparītamadhurapākitvaṃ na tatra kaṭu rasatvenoṣṇatvam ityarthaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:799: asmiṃśca pakṣe upadekṣyate iti yathā payaḥ ityādinā sambadhyate // 5
GS40caraka_u:803_0: samprati madhuratiktakaṣāyāṇāṃ śītatvaṃ tathā kaṭvamlalavaṇānāṃ coṣṇatvaṃ tathā kaṭutiktakaṣāyāṇāṃ cāvṛṣyatvamityādayo rasadvāreṇa
GS40caraka_u:803_1: dravyāṇāṃ ye guṇā uktāstadapavādam āha teṣāmityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:804_0: rasopadeśena rasaguṇakathanadvāreṇa dravyāṇāṃ yaḥ śītoṣṇādiguṇasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtaḥ sa vīryataḥ pākataścāviparītānāṃ teṣāṃ vakṣyamāṇakṣīrādidravyāṇāmeva
GS40caraka_u:804_1: nirdeṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ na tu rasaviparītavīryavipākānām ityarthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:806: upadekṣyata iti yathā paya ityādibhiḥ sambadhyate // 4
GS40caraka_u:807: etāni hi dravyaguṇakathanaprasaṅge rasāviparītavīryavipākatayaivopadeṣṭavyānīti rasānurūpaguṇatvam eṣāṃ jñātavyam ityarthaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:808: idaṃ tūdāharaṇaikadeśamātraṃ tenāparāṇy apyevaṃjātīyāny udāhartavyānītyāha evamādīnītyādi evamādīni evaṃprakārāṇi godhūmādīnītyarthaḥ // 7]
GS40caraka_u:809: madhuraṃ kiṃciduṣṇaṃ syāt kaṣāyaṃ tiktameva ca /
GS40caraka_u:814: samprati yatra viruddhavīryatvena rasenoṣṇatvādi na nirdeśyaṃ tad āha madhuram ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:815: kiṃcit kaṣāyaṃ coṣṇaṃ tiktaṃ coṣṇam iti yojanā kaṣāyatiktalavaṇānām udāharaṇam asūtritānām api prakaraṇāt kṛtam // 2
GS40caraka_u:817: etacca tiktasya kaṣāyasya coṣṇatāyām udāharaṇam abjānūpāmiṣaṃ tu madhurasyoṣṇavīryatve //
GS40caraka_u:818: kiṃcidamlaṃ hi saṃgrāhi kiṃcidamlaṃ bhinatti ca /
GS40caraka_u:819: yathā kapitthaṃ saṃgrāhi bhedi cāmalakaṃ tathā // Car_1,26.50
GS40caraka_u:821: kaṣāyaḥ stambhanaḥ śītaḥ so 'bhayāyām ato'nyathā // Car_1,26.51
GS40caraka_u:823: dṛṣṭaṃ tulyarase'pyevaṃ dravye dravye guṇāntaram // Car_1,26.52
GS40caraka_u:825: vīryaprasaṅgād anyam apyamlādīnāṃ viruddhaguṇam āha kiṃcid ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:826: abhayāyām ato'nyatheti abhayāyāṃ kaṣāyo raso bhedanaś coṣṇaś cetyarthaḥ //
GS40caraka_u:829: madhyo'mlaḥ kaṭukaś cāntyaḥ snigdhānāṃ madhuraḥ paraḥ /
GS40caraka_u:834: kecil laghūnām avaramicchanti lavaṇaṃ rasam // Car_1,26.56
GS40caraka_u:838: raukṣyeṇa kaṣāya uttama iti rūkṣatamaḥ tikto rūkṣaḥ kaṭustu madhyo rūkṣataraḥ evam anyatrāpi kaṭukaścāntya iti avara ityarthaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:841: amlāt kaṭur ityādau amlātkaṭurlaghuḥ tataḥ kaṭukād uttamāt tikto laghutvenottamottamaḥ uttamāt kaṭukāduttama uttamottamaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:844: etena gaurave lāghave cāvaratvaṃ lavaṇasya svīkurvan gaurave 'vara
GS40caraka_u:845: ityanenāmlakaṭutiktebhyo gurutvaṃ svīkaroti lavaṇasya lāghave cāvara ityanenāmlādapi laghuno 'lpaṃ lāghavaṃ lavaṇasya svīkaroti // 9
GS40caraka_u:846_0: na ca vācyam amle pṛthivī kāraṇaṃ lavaṇe tu toyaṃ tataḥ pṛthivyapekṣayā toyajanyasya lavaṇasyaiva lāghavamucitamiti yato
GS40caraka_u:846_1: na niveśena gauravalāghave śakyete 'vadhārayituṃ tathāhi toyātirekakṛto madhuraḥ
GS40caraka_u:848: paraṃ cāto vipākānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sampravakṣyate // Car_1,26.57
GS40caraka_u:854: kaṭukādiśabdena ca tadādhāraṃ dravyamucyate yato na rasāḥ pacyante kiṃtu dravyam eva // 3
GS40caraka_u:856: vipākalakṣaṇaṃ tu jaṭharāgniyogād āhārasya niṣṭhākāle yo guṇa utpadyate sa vipākaḥ vacanaṃ hi /
GS40caraka_u:859: madhuro lavaṇāmlau ca snigdhabhāvāt trayo rasāḥ /
GS40caraka_u:860: vātamūtrapurīṣāṇāṃ prāyo mokṣe sukhā matāḥ // Car_1,26.59
GS40caraka_u:864: samprati vakṣyamāṇavipākalakṣaṇe madhurāmlapākayor vātamūtrapurīṣān avarodhakatve tathā kaṭorvipākasya vātamūtrapurīṣavibandhakatve hetum āha madhura ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:865: atra madhurāmlalavaṇā niṣṭhāpākaṃ gatā api santaḥ snehaguṇayogād vātapurīṣāṇāṃ visargaṃ sukhena kurvantīti vākyārthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:871: teṣāṃ guruḥ syānmadhuraḥ kaṭukāmlāv ato 'nyathā // Car_1,26.62
GS40caraka_u:873: samprati vipākalakṣaṇaṃ hetuvyutpāditaṃ śukrahatvādiviśeṣayuktaṃ vaktum āha śukrahetyādi //
GS40caraka_u:878: samprati yathoktavipākalakṣaṇānāṃ dravyabhede kvacidalpatvaṃ kvacinmadhyatvaṃ kvacic cotkṛṣṭatvaṃ yathā bhavati tad āha vipāketyādi //
GS40caraka_u:879: vipākalakṣaṇasyālpamadhyabhūyiṣṭhatām upalakṣayet prati prati dravyāṇāṃ guṇavaiśeṣyāddhetor ityarthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:880: etena dravyeṣu yad guṇavaiśeṣyaṃ madhuratvamadhurataratvamadhuratamatvādi tato hetor vipākānāmalpatvādayo viśeṣā bhavantītyuktaṃ bhavati // 3
GS40caraka_u:881_0: atra kecidbruvate pratirasaṃ pāko bhavati yathā madhurādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇmadhurādayaḥ pākā iti kecid bruvate balavatāṃ rasānāmabalavanto
GS40caraka_u:881_1: rasā vaśatāṃ yānti tataś cānavasthitaḥ pākaḥ tatraitaddvitayamapi pāke vyavasthākaraṇam anādṛtya suśrutena dvividhaḥ pāko
GS40caraka_u:882_0: dvaividhyaṃ ca pañcabhūtātmake dravye gurubhūtapṛthivītoyātirekānmadhuraḥ pāko bhavati śeṣalaghubhūtātirekāt tu kaṭukaḥ pāko
GS40caraka_u:882_1: bhavati yaduktaṃ dravyeṣu pacyamāneṣu yeṣv ambupṛthivīguṇāḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:886_0: pratirasapāke tathānavasthitapāke ca dravyaṃ rasaguṇenaiva tulyaṃ pākāvasthāyāmapi bhavati tena na kaścidviśeṣo vipākena
GS40caraka_u:886_1: tatra bodhyata iti suśrutena tatpakṣadvayam upekṣitamiti sādhu kṛtam // 10
GS40caraka_u:887_0: tṛtīyāmlapākanirāsastu doṣam āvahati yato vrīhikulatthādīnām amlapākatayā pittakartṛtvamupalabhyate atha manyase vrīhyāder
GS40caraka_u:887_1: uṣṇavīryatvena tatra pittakartṛtvaṃ tanna madhurasya vrīhestanmate madhuravipākasyoṣṇavīryatāyāmapi satyāṃ na pittakartṛtvamupapadyate
GS40caraka_u:888_0: kiṃca amlapākatvād vrīhyādeḥ pittamamlaguṇamutpadyate yadi tu tad uṣṇavīryatākṛtaṃ syāttadā kaṭuguṇabhūyiṣṭhaṃ pittaṃ syāt
GS40caraka_u:888_1: dṛśyate ca vrīhibhakṣaṇād amlodgārādināmlaguṇabhūyiṣṭhataiveti kiṃca pṛthivīsomaguṇātirekān madhuraḥ pāko bhavati vāyvagnyākāśātirekācca
GS40caraka_u:888_2: kaṭur bhavatīti pakṣe yadā vyāmiśraguṇātirekatā bhavati tadā somāgnyātmakasyāmlasyotpādaḥ kathaṃ pratikṣepaṇīyaḥ athavā tantrakārayoḥ
GS40caraka_u:888_3: kim anayor anena vacanamātravirodhena kartavyaṃ yato yadamlapākaṃ carako brūte tatsuśrutena vīryoṣṇam iti kṛtvā samādhīyate
GS40caraka_u:888_4: tena na kaścid dravyaguṇe virodhaḥ // yattu suśrute'mlapākanirāsārthaṃ dūṣaṇam ucyate pittaṃ hi vidagdhamamlatāmupaiti ityādinā
GS40caraka_u:889_0: nanu lavaṇasya madhurapākitve pittaraktādikartṛtvamanupapannaṃ tathā tiktakaṣāyayoḥ kaṭupākitve pittahantṛtvamanupapannaṃ
GS40caraka_u:889_1: naivaṃ satyapi lavaṇasya madhurapākitve tatra lavaṇarasa uṣṇaṃ ca vīryaṃ yadasti tena tat pittaraktādikārakaṃ vipākastu tatra
GS40caraka_u:889_2: pittaraktaharaṇalakṣaṇe kārye bādhitaḥ san sṛṣṭaviṇmūtra ityādinā lakṣaṇena lakṣyata eva // 16
GS40caraka_u:890: etena yaducyate lavaṇe madhuro vipākaścedrasavīryābhyāṃ bādhitaḥ san svakāryakaro na bhavati tatkiṃ tenopadiṣṭeneti tannirastaṃ bhavati // 17
GS40caraka_u:891: yato'styeva sṛṣṭaviṇmūtratādinā tatra lavaṇe madhuravipākitvaṃ lakṣaṇīyam // 18
GS40caraka_u:893: anye tv etaddoṣabhayāl lavaṇo'pyamlaṃ pacyata iti vyākhyānayanti
GS40caraka_u:895: tanna kaṭvādīnāṃ kaṭurvipāko'mlo'mlasya śeṣayor madhuraḥ iti
GS40caraka_u:897: naca vācyaṃ kasmāt traya eva vipākā bhavanti na punastiktādayo'pīti yato bhūtasvabhāva evaiṣaḥ yena madhurādayas traya eva bhavanti bhūtasvabhāvāś
GS40caraka_u:899_0: nanu yaśca rasaviparītaḥ pāko yathā lavaṇasya madhuraḥ tiktakaṣāyayoś ca kaṭuḥ sa ucyatāṃ yastu samānaguṇo madhurasya madhuro'mlasyāmlaḥ
GS40caraka_u:899_1: kaṭukasya vā kaṭukaḥ tatkathane kiṃ prayojanaṃ yato rasaguṇair eva tatra
GS40caraka_u:901: naivaṃ yena lavaṇādivad visadṛśarasāntarotpādaśaṅkānirārāsārtham api tatrānuguṇo'pi vipāko vaktavya eva vipākajaśca rasa āhārapariṇāmānte
GS40caraka_u:902_0: bhavati prākṛtastu raso vipākaviruddhaḥ pariṇāmakālaṃ varjayitvā jñeyaḥ tena pippalyāḥ kaṭukarasatvam ādau kaṇṭhasthaśleṣmakṣapaṇamukhaśodhanādikartṛtvena
GS40caraka_u:902_1: saprayojanaṃ madhuravipākatvaṃ tu pariṇāmena vṛṣyatvādijñāpanena saprayojanam // 24
GS40caraka_u:903: tathā yatra vipākasya rasāḥ samānaguṇatayānuguṇā bhavanti tatra balavat kāryaṃ bhavati viparyaye tu durbalam iti jñeyam // 25
GS40caraka_u:904_0: etacca pākatrayaṃ dravyaniyataṃ tena grahaṇyadhyāye vakṣyamāṇāhārāvasthāpākādbhinnam eva tatra hy aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāmeva rasānām
GS40caraka_u:904_1: avasthāvaśāt trayaḥ pākā vācyāḥ annasya bhuktamātrasya ṣaḍrasasya prapākataḥ ityādinā granthena // 26]
GS40caraka_u:907: śītoṣṇamiti vīryaṃ tu kriyate yena yā kriyā /

GS40caraka_u:912_0: vaidyake hi rasavipākaprabhāvavyatirikte prabhūtakāryakāriṇi guṇe vīryamiti saṃjñā tenāṣṭavidhavīryavādimate picchilaviśadādayo
GS40caraka_u:912_1: guṇā na rasādiviparītaṃ kāryaṃ prāyaḥ kurvanti tena teṣāṃ rasādyupadeśenaiva grahaṇaṃ mṛdvādīnāṃ tu rasādyabhibhāvakatvamasti
GS40caraka_u:912_2: yathā pippalyāṃ kaṭurasakāryaṃ pittakopanamabhibhūya tadgate mṛduśītavīrye pittameva śamayatīti tathā kaṣāye tiktānurase
GS40caraka_u:912_3: mahati pañcamūle tatkāryaṃ vātakopanam abhibhūyoṣṇena vīryeṇa tadviruddhaṃ vātaśamanameva kriyate tathā
GS40caraka_u:914: yaduktaṃ suśrute etāni khalu vīryāṇi svabalaguṇotkarṣād rasam abhibhūyātmakarma darśayanti ityādi // 4
GS40caraka_u:915: śītoṣṇavīryavādimataṃ tv agnīṣomīyatvāj jagataḥ śītoṣṇayoreva prādhānyājjñeyam // 5
GS40caraka_u:919: etacca matadvayam apyācāryasya paribhāṣāsiddhamanumatameva yenottaratra rasavīryavipākānāṃ sāmānyaṃ yatra lakṣyate ityādau pāribhāṣikam eva vīryaṃ nirdekṣyati // 7
GS40caraka_u:920: pāribhāṣikavīryasaṃjñāparityāgena tu śaktiparyāyasya vīryasya lakṣaṇamāha vīryaṃ tv ityādi vīryamiti śaktiḥ // 9
GS40caraka_u:921: yeneti rasena vā vipākena vā prabhāvena vā gurvādiparādibhirvā guṇairyā kriyā tarpaṇahlādanaśamanādirūpā kriyate tasyāṃ kriyāyāṃ tad rasādi vīryam // 10
GS40caraka_u:922: ata evoktaṃ suśrute yena kurvanti tadvīryam iti // 11
GS40caraka_u:923: atraiva lokaprasiddhām upapattim āha nāvīryam ityādi // 12
GS40caraka_u:929: rasādīnāmekadravyaniviṣṭānāṃ bhedena nārthaṃ lakṣaṇamāha raso nipāta ityādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:931_0: karmaniṣṭhayeti karmaṇo niṣṭhā niṣpattiḥ karmaniṣṭhā kriyāparisamāptiḥ rasopayoge sati yo 'ntyāhārapariṇāmakṛtaḥ karmaviśeṣaḥ
GS40caraka_u:931_1: kaphaśukrābhivṛddhyādilakṣaṇaḥ tena vipāko niścīyate // adhīvāsaḥ sahāvasthānaṃ yāvad adhīvāsāditi yāvaccharīranivāsāt etacca
GS40caraka_u:932_0: nipātācceti śarīrasaṃyogamātrāt tena kiṃcid vīryam adhīvāsād upalabhyate yathānūpamāṃsāder uṣṇatvaṃ kiṃcic ca nipātādeva
GS40caraka_u:932_1: labhyate yathā marīcādīnāṃ tīkṣṇatvādi kiṃcic ca nipātādhīvāsābhyāṃ yathā marīcādīnāmeva // 5
GS40caraka_u:933_0: etena rasaḥ pratyakṣeṇaiva vipākastu nityaparokṣaḥ tatkāryeṇānumīyate vīryaṃ tu kiṃcidanumānena yathā saindhavagataṃ śaityam
GS40caraka_u:933_1: ānūpamāṃsagataṃ vā auṣṇyaṃ kiṃcic ca vīryaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva yathā rājikāgatam auṣṇyaṃ ghrāṇena picchilaviśadasnigdharūkṣādayaḥ
GS40caraka_u:934: etacca vīryaṃ sahajaṃ kṛtrimaṃ ca jñeyam // 7
GS40caraka_u:935: etacca yathāsambhavaṃ gurulaghvādiṣu vīryeṣu lakṣaṇaṃ jñeyam // 8
GS40caraka_u:939: viśeṣaḥ karmaṇāṃ caiva prabhāvastasya sa smṛtaḥ // Car_1,26.67
GS40caraka_u:944_0: sāmānyaṃ lakṣyata ityanena rasādikāryatvena yannāvadhārayituṃ śakyate kāryaṃ tat prabhāvakṛtam iti sūcayati ata evoktaṃprabhāvo
GS40caraka_u:944_1: 'cintya ucyate rasavīryavipākakāryatayācintya ityarthaḥ // kaṭukaḥ kaṭukaḥ pāke vīryoṣṇaścitrako mataḥ /
GS40caraka_u:949: tat prabhāvakṛtaṃ teṣāṃ prabhāvo'cintya ucyate // Car_1,26.70
GS40caraka_u:951: kiṃcidrasena kurute karma vīryeṇa cāparam // Car_1,26.71
GS40caraka_u:952: dravyaṃ guṇena pākena prabhāveṇa ca kiṃcana /
GS40caraka_u:956: asyaiva durabhigamatvād udāharaṇāni bahūnyāha kaṭuka ityādinā // 1
GS40caraka_u:959: ūrdhvānulomikamiti yugapad ubhayabhāgaharaṃ kiṃvā ūrdhvaharaṃ tathānulomaharaṃ ca // 4
GS40caraka_u:961_0: etaccodāharaṇamātraṃ tena jīvanamedhyādidravyasya rasādyacintyaṃ sarvaṃ prabhāva iti jñeyam prabhāvaśceha dravyaśaktir abhipretā
GS40caraka_u:961_1: sā ca dravyāṇāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣaḥ dantītvādiyuktā vyaktireva yataḥ śaktirhi svarūpameva bhāvānāṃ nātiriktaṃ kiṃciddharmāntaram
GS40caraka_u:961_2: evaṃ pradeśāntaroktaguṇaprabhāvādiṣvapi vācyam yathoktaṃ dravyāṇi hi dravyaprabhāvādguṇaprabhāvām ityādi // 7
GS40caraka_u:962_0: na ca vācyaṃ dantyādiḥ svarūpata eva virecayati tena kimiti jalādyupahatā dantī na virecayatīti pratibandhakābhāvaviśiṣṭasyaiva
GS40caraka_u:962_1: prabhāvasya kāraṇatvāt jalopahatāyāṃ dantyāṃ jalopaghātaḥ pratibandhaka ityādyanusaraṇīyam // 8
GS40caraka_u:963: naiyāyikaśaktivāde yā ca viṣasya viṣaghnatve upapattir uktā ūrdhvādhogāmitvavirodhalakṣaṇā sāntarbhāgatvāt prabhāvād eva bhavati // 9
GS40caraka_u:971: yaḥ śīghraṃ lavaṇo jñeyaḥ sa vidāhānmukhasya ca // Car_1,26.76
GS40caraka_u:973: vidahanmukhanāsākṣi saṃsrāvī sa kaṭuḥ smṛtaḥ // Car_1,26.77
GS40caraka_u:974: pratihanti nipāte yo rasanaṃ svadate na ca /
GS40caraka_u:977: badhnātīva ca yaḥ kaṇṭhaṃ kaṣāyaḥ sa vikāsyapi // Car_1,26.79
GS40caraka_u:982: vikāsīti hṛdayavikasanaśīla uktaṃ hi suśrute hṛdayaṃ pīḍayati iti // 4]
GS40caraka_u:983_0: evamuktavantaṃ bhagavantamātreyamagniveśa uvāca bhagavan śrutametadavitatham arthasampadyuktaṃ bhagavato yathāvad dravyaguṇakarmādhikāre
GS40caraka_u:983_1: vacaḥ paraṃ tv āhāravikārāṇāṃ vairodhikānāṃ lakṣaṇam anatisaṃkṣepeṇopadiśyamānaṃ śuśrūṣāmaha iti // Car_1,26.80
GS40caraka_u:986: śarīradhātuvirodhaṃ kurvantīti vairodhikāḥ lakṣyate vairodhikamaneneti lakṣaṇaṃ vairodhikābhidhāyako grantha eva // 2
GS40caraka_u:988_0: tam uvāca bhagavān ātreyaḥ dehadhātupratyanīkabhūtāni dravyāṇi dehadhātubhirvirodham āpadyante parasparaguṇaviruddhāni kānicit
GS40caraka_u:988_1: kānicit saṃyogāt saṃskārād aparāṇi deśakālamātrādibhiś cāparāṇi tathā svabhāvādaparāṇi // Car_1,26.81
GS40caraka_u:990: dehadhātupratyanīkabhūtānīti dehadhātūnāṃ rasādīnāṃ vātādīnāṃ ca prakṛtisthānāṃ pratyanīkasvarūpāṇi virodhamāpadyanta iti dehadhātūnāṃ virodhamācaranti dūṣayantīti yāvat // 2
GS40caraka_u:991_0: yathābhūtāni dravyāṇi dehadhātubhirvirodhamāpadyante tadāha parasparaviruddhāni kānicid ityādi tatra parasparaguṇaviruddhāni
GS40caraka_u:991_1: yathā na matsyān payasābhyavaharet ubhayaṃ hy etad ityādinoktāni saṃyogaviruddhaṃ yathā tadeva nikucaṃ pakvaṃ na māṣa ityādinoktaṃ
GS40caraka_u:991_2: yat saṃskārādiviruddhaguṇakathanaṃ vinā sāhityamātreṇa viruddham ucyate tat saṃyogaviruddham // 5
GS40caraka_u:992: matsyapayasos tu yadyapi sahopayogo viruddhatvenoktaḥ tathāpyasau guṇaviruddhatvena kathita iti guṇavirodhakasyaivodāharaṇam /
GS40caraka_u:993: virodhaśca viruddhaguṇatve satyapi kvacid eva dravyaprabhāvād bhavati tena ṣaḍrasāhāropayoge madhurāmlayor viruddhaśītoṣṇavīryayor virodho nodbhāvanīyaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:994: saṃskārato viruddhaṃ yathā na kapotān sarṣapatailabhṛṣṭān ityādi // 7
GS40caraka_u:996: tatra bhūmiviruddhaṃ yathā tadeva bhasmapāṃśuparidhvastam kiṃvā yat kiṃcidagocarabhṛtaṃ taddeśaviruddhaṃ śarīraviruddhaṃ yathā uṣṇārtasya madhu maraṇāya // 9
GS40caraka_u:1001_0: tatra yānyāhāramadhikṛtya bhūyiṣṭham upayujyante teṣām ekadeśaṃ vairodhikam adhikṛtyopadekṣyāmaḥ na matsyān payasā sahābhyavaharet
GS40caraka_u:1001_1: ubhayaṃ hy etanmadhuraṃ madhuravipākaṃ mahābhiṣyandi śītoṣṇatvādviruddhavīryaṃ viruddhavīryatvācchoṇitapradūṣaṇāya mahābhiṣyanditvānmārgoparodhāya
GS40caraka_u:1003_0: payasā sahābhyavahared anyatraikasmāc cilicimāt sa punaḥ śakalī lohitanayanaḥ sarvato lohitarājī rohitākāraḥ prāyo bhūmau
GS40caraka_u:1003_1: carati taṃ cet payasā sahābhyavaharenniḥsaṃśayaṃ śoṇitajānāṃ vibandhajānāṃ ca vyādhīnāmanyatamamathavā maraṇaṃ prāpnuyāditi //
GS40caraka_u:1006: śītoṣṇatvāditi payaḥ śītam uṣṇavīryāśca matsyāḥ śeṣaṃ madhuratvādi samānam // 2
GS40caraka_u:1008: sa punaḥ śakalī ityādinā nāndiniḥ iti khyāto matsya ucyate // 4]
GS40caraka_u:1009: neti bhagavānātreyaḥ sarvāneva matsyānna payasā sahābhyavaharedviśeṣatastu cilicimaṃ sa hi mahābhiṣyanditvāt sthūlalakṣaṇatarān etān vyādhīn upajanayatyāmaviṣam udīrayati ca /
GS40caraka_u:1010: grāmyānūpaudakapiśitāni ca madhutilaguḍapayomāṣamūlakabisair virūḍhadhānyairvā naikadhyamadyāt tanmūlaṃ hi bādhiryāndhyavepathujāḍyakalamūkatāmaiṇmiṇyam athavā maraṇamāpnoti /
GS40caraka_u:1011_0: na pauṣkaraṃ rohiṇīkaṃ śākaṃ kapotān vā sarṣapatailabhraṣṭān madhupayobhyāṃ sahābhyavaharet tanmūlaṃ hi śoṇitābhiṣyandadhamanīpravicayāpasmāraśaṅkhakagalagaṇḍarohiṇīnām
GS40caraka_u:1013: na jātukaśākaṃ na nikucaṃ pakvaṃ madhupayobhyāṃ sahopayojyam etaddhi maraṇāyāthavā balavarṇatejovīryoparodhāyālaghuvyādhaye ṣāṇḍhyāya ceti /
GS40caraka_u:1014: tadeva nikucaṃ pakvaṃ na māṣasūpaguḍasarpirbhiḥ sahopayojyaṃ vairodhikatvāt /
GS40caraka_u:1015_1: cānyāni dravyāṇi sarvaṃ cāmlaṃ dravamadravaṃ ca payasā saha viruddham /
GS40caraka_u:1017: padmottarikāśākaṃ śārkaro maireyo madhu ca sahopayuktaṃ viruddhaṃ vātaṃ cātikopayati /
GS40caraka_u:1021: balākā vāruṇyā saha kulmāṣairapi viruddhā saiva śūkaravasāparibhṛṣṭā sadyo vyāpādayati /
GS40caraka_u:1022: mayūramāṃsam eraṇḍasīsakāvasaktam eraṇḍāgnipluṣṭam eraṇḍatailayuktaṃ sadyo vyāpādayati /
GS40caraka_u:1023: hāridrakamāṃsaṃ hāridrasīsakāvasaktaṃ hāridrāgnipluṣṭaṃ sadyo vyāpādayati tadeva bhasmapāṃśuparidhvastaṃ sakṣaudraṃ sadyo maraṇāya /

GS40caraka_u:1031: pauṣkarādīnāṃ madhupayobhyāṃ sahābhyavahāro viruddhaḥ pauṣkaraṃ puṣkaratratrarūpaṃ śākaṃ rohiṇī kaṭurohiṇī // 3

GS40caraka_u:1130: saṃgrahe dravyasaṃkhyā rasāśrayā iti bhedaścaiṣām ityādinā rasasaṃkhyā hi paramārthato dravyasaṃkhyaiva nirguṇatvād rasānām iti bhāvaḥ // 1

GS40caraka_u:1132: uddeśo dravyāṇāṃ śītaṃ vīryeṇa ityādinā apavādo dravyāṇāṃ madhuraṃ kiṃcit ityādinā // 3]
GS40caraka_u:1137: samprati sāmānyenoktānāṃ guṇakarmabhyāṃ prativyaktyanuktānāṃ prativyaktiprāya upayogidravyasya viśiṣṭaguṇakarmakathanārtham annapānavidhir adhyāyo'bhidhīyate // 1

GS40caraka_u:1145: iṣṭamiti abhimataṃ hitaṃ ca kiṃvā iṣṭaṃ priyaṃ hitaṃ tu vidhivihitaśabdenaiva prāpyate //
GS40caraka_u:1146: vidhir vakṣyamāṇarasavimāne tadetadāhāravidhānam ityādigranthavācyaḥ tathendriyopakramaṇīye nāratnapāṇiḥ ityādinoktaṃ vidhānaṃ tena vidhinā vihitaṃ vidhivihitam // 3
GS40caraka_u:1148: varṇādiṣu yadyat prathamam annapāne gṛhyate tattat pūrvam uktam // 5

GS40caraka_u:2284: ayaṃ ca rasadoṣaprabhāvadvārā dravyavikāraprabhāvaniścayo na sarvatra dravye vikāre cetyāha na tv evaṃ khalu sarvatreti // 1
