GS40caraka_u:2286: vikṛtiviṣamasamavetānām iti vikṛtisamavetānāṃ tathā viṣamasamavetānāṃ ceti vikṛtiviṣamasamavetānām samavetānāmiti militānāṃ rasānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ ca // 4
GS40caraka_u:2287: tatra rasasya vikṛtisamavāyo yathā madhure taṇḍulīyake madhuro hi prakṛtyā snehavṛṣyatvādikaraḥ taṇḍulīyake tu vikṛtisamavetatvena tanna karoti // 5
GS40caraka_u:2288: viṣamasamavetāstu tile kaṣāyakaṭutiktamadhurāḥ yadi hīme rasāḥ samayā mātrayā samavetāḥ syustatastilo'pi pittaśleṣmaharastridoṣaharo vā syāt
GS40caraka_u:2289_0: pittakaphakarastvayaṃ tenātra rasānāṃ kvacit kartṛtvam akartṛtvaṃ ca kvaciditi vaiṣamyam unnīyate nānātmakānāmityādihetutrayaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2291: nānātmakānāmiti nānārūpahetujanitānāṃ tena hetubhedabalādeva rasadoṣayor vikṛto viṣamo vā melako bhavatītyarthaḥ // 9
GS40caraka_u:2295: parasparaguṇopaghātastu yadyapi doṣāṇāṃ prāyo nāstyeva tathāpyadṛṣṭavaśāt kvacid bhavatīti jñeyaṃ rasānāṃ tu prabalenānyopaghāto bhavatyeva // 13
GS40caraka_u:2296: anyaiśca vikalpanairiti anyaiśca bhedakaiḥ tatra rasasya bhedakāḥ svarasakalkādayaḥ ekasyaiva hi dravyasya kalpanāviśeṣeṇa guṇāntarāṇi bhavanti // 14
GS40caraka_u:2298: yaduktaṃ sa eva kupito doṣaḥ samutthānaviśeṣataḥ // 16
GS40caraka_u:2300_0: asminvyākhyāne rasānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ ca ya utkarṣāpakarṣakṛto viṣamasamavāyaḥ pṛthagucyate sa na yujyate yato viṣamasamavāye 'pyutkṛṣṭasya
GS40caraka_u:2300_1: rasasya tathā doṣasya cotkṛṣṭā guṇā apakṛṣṭasya cāpakṛṣṭā guṇā bhavantīti kṛtvāvayavaprabhāvān anumānenaiva samudāyaprabhāvānumānaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2300_2: śakyam athocyate viṣamamelake rasasya doṣasya ca na ta eva guṇā utkṛṣṭā apakṛṣṭā vā bhavanti kiṃtu guṇāntarameva bhavati
GS40caraka_u:2300_3: hanta tarhi vikṛta evāyaṃ samavāyo visadṛśakāryakāraṇatvāt // 19
GS40caraka_u:2301_0: tadevaṃ dūṣaṇadarśanād anyathā vyākhyāyate yad dvividho melako bhavati rasānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ ca prakṛtyanuguṇaḥ prakṛtyananuguṇaśca
GS40caraka_u:2301_1: tatra yo militānāṃ prākṛtaguṇānupamardena melako bhavati sa prakṛtisamasamavāyaśabdenocyate yastu prākṛtaguṇopamardena bhavati
GS40caraka_u:2302: vikṛtyā hetubhūtayā viṣamaḥ prakṛtyananuguṇaḥ samavāyo vikṛtiviṣamasamavāya ityarthaḥ // 20
GS40caraka_u:2304_0: ye tu vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyau pṛthag eva kurvanti viṣamasamavāyasya vaiṣamyatāratamyenātibahuprapañcitatvād viṣamāvayavaguṇānumānaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2304_1: duḥśakam iti kṛtvā tadapi dravyavikāraprabhāveṇaiva vyapadiśanti // tathāyukte hi samudaye samudāyaprabhāvatattvamevam evopalabhya
GS40caraka_u:2306: atha kathaṃ tarhi vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyaprabhāvajñānam ityāha tathāyukte hītyādi // 1
GS40caraka_u:2309_0: samadhṛte hi madhusarpiṣi sūryāvartākhye vā doṣasamudaye na saṃyujyamānamadhughṛtaguṇakramāgataṃ mārakatvaṃ na ca vātādidoṣaprabhāvagataṃ
GS40caraka_u:2309_1: sūryavṛddhyā vardhiṣṇutvaṃ sūryāvartasya kiṃ tu saṃyogamahimakṛtam evetyarthaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:2310_0: yacca gatidvayaṃ doṣarasamelakasya tena prakṛtisamasamavāyarūpaṃ saṃnipātaṃ jvaranidāne doṣaliṅgamelakenaivoktavān yaduktaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2310_1: pṛthaguktalakṣaṇasaṃsargād dvāṃdvikam anyatamaṃ sāṃnipātikaṃ vā jvaraṃ vidyād iti yastu vikṛtiviṣamasamavetastridoṣakṛto
GS40caraka_u:2310_2: jvaras tasya cikitsite kṣaṇe dāhaḥ kṣaṇe śītam ityādinā lakṣaṇam uktam // 7
GS40caraka_u:2311: na hi śyāvaraktakoṭhotpattyādi tatroktaṃ vātādijvare kvacid asti // 8
GS40caraka_u:2312: evaṃ rase'pi yatrāmrāte madhuratvaṃ prakṛtisamasamavetaṃ tatrāmrātaṃ madhuram etanmātram evoktaṃ tena madhurasāmānyaguṇāgataṃ tasya vātapittaharatvamapi labhyata eva // 9
GS40caraka_u:2313: yatra vārtāke kaṭutiktatvena vātakaratvaṃ prāptamapi ca vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyāttanna bhavati tatrācāryeṇa vārtākaṃ vātaghnam ityuktam eva // 10
GS40caraka_u:2315: yattu prakṛtisamasamavāyakṛtarasadoṣaguṇadvārā prāptamapi dravyaguṇaṃ vikāralakṣaṇaṃ ca brūte tat prakarṣārthaṃ spaṣṭārthaṃ ceti jñeyam // 12]
GS40caraka_u:2316: tasmād rasaprabhāvataś ca dravyaprabhāvataś ca doṣaprabhāvataś ca vikāraprabhāvataś ca tattvamupadekṣyāmaḥ [{Āyurvedadīpikā}
GS40caraka_u:2319_0: yattu pūrvaṃ tatrādau rasadravyadoṣavikāraprabhāvān upadekṣyāmaḥ ityanena rasādiprabhāvavyākhyānapratijñānaṃ kṛtaṃ tattu
GS40caraka_u:2319_1: rasaprabhāvānumānenaiva dravyaprabhāvakathanāt tathā doṣaprabhāveṇa ca vikāraprabhāvakathanāc caritārthaṃ syāt // 3
GS40caraka_u:2320_0: iha tu vikṛtiviṣamasamavāyātmake dravye vikāre vā rasadoṣaprabhāvānumānena na dravyavikāraprabhāvānumānam astīti kṛtvā pṛthak
GS40caraka_u:2321_0: iha dravyāṇāṃ vīryaprabhāvavipākaprabhāvau ca dravyaprabhāve rasaprabhāve vāntarbhāvanīyau tatra yau rasānuguṇau vīryavipākaprabhāvau
GS40caraka_u:2321_1: tau rase yau tu rasakramoktavīryavipākaviparītau vīryavipākau tau dravyaprabhāve boddhavyau // 6
GS40caraka_u:2322: upadekṣyāma iti nikhilena tantreṇa rasādiprabhāvatattvaṃ pṛthag upadekṣyāma ityarthaḥ rasādiprabhāvaḥ prapañcena nikhile tantra eva vaktavyaḥ // 7]
GS40caraka_u:2328: eṣa iti rasāḥ ṣaḍ ityādinā tattvamupadekṣyāmaḥ ityantena granthenokta ityarthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:2330: anye tu tatraiṣa rasaprabhāva uddiṣṭo bhavati iti paṭhanti // 4
GS40caraka_u:2331_0: asmin pakṣe dravyadoṣavikāraprabhāvo 'pi 'tra uddiṣṭaḥ so 'pi rasadvārā tena rasasyaiva prapañcābhihitatvāt tasyaivābhidhānam
GS40caraka_u:2331_1: upasaṃharati na dravyādīnāmiti jñeyam dravyaprabhāvamityādau punariti sāmānyena
GS40caraka_u:2332: dravyaprabhāvakathanāt punaḥ śṛṅgagrāhikayā tailādidravyaprabhāvaṃ kathayiṣyāma ityarthaḥ praśamanārthānīti praśamanaprayojanāni // 6]
GS40caraka_u:2333_0: tatra tailaṃ snehauṣṇyagauravopapannatvād vātaṃ jayati satatamabhyasyamānaṃ vāto hi raukṣyaśaityalāghavopapanno viruddhaguṇo
GS40caraka_u:2333_1: bhavati viruddhaguṇasaṃnipāte hi bhūyasālpam avajīyate tasmāttailaṃ vātaṃ jayati satatam abhyasyamānam /
GS40caraka_u:2334: sarpiḥ khalvevameva pittaṃ jayati mādhuryācchaityānmandatvācca pittaṃ hy amadhuram uṣṇaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca /
GS40caraka_u:2335: madhu ca śleṣmāṇaṃ jayati raukṣyāt taikṣṇyāt kaṣāyatvāc ca śleṣmā hi snigdho mando madhuraśca
GS40caraka_u:2336: yac cānyadapi kiṃcid dravyamevaṃ vātapittakaphebhyo guṇato viparītaṃ syāt tac caitāñjayaty abhyasyamānam // Car_3,1.14
GS40caraka_u:2341: nanu viruddhaguṇayor madhye bhūyasālpaṃ jīyate tat kathaṃ tailaṃ vātaṃ jayati na hy asya vātaṃ prati bhūyastvaṃ yuktamityāha satatam abhyasyamānam iti // 4
GS40caraka_u:2342: satatopayogena hi tailaṃ vātād adhikaṃ bhavati tena vātaṃ jayatītyarthaḥ
GS40caraka_u:2343: sarpiḥ khalvevameveti sarpirapi satatam abhyasyamānam ityarthaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:2345: iha ca prabhāvaśabdena sāmānyena dravyaśaktir ucyate nācintyaśaktiḥ tena tailādīnāṃ snehauṣṇyādiguṇādapi vātādiśamanaṃ dravyaprabhāvādeva bhavati // 8
GS40caraka_u:2346: sarpiṣi ca yadyapi madhuro rasaḥ pittapraśame vyāpriyate tathāpi mādhuryaśaityamandatvaiḥ pittaśamanaṃ sarpiḥkāryameva tena dravyaprabhāva eva vācyaḥ // 9
GS40caraka_u:2347: yadā tu rasadvārā kāryaṃ dravyasya cintyate tadā rasaprabhāva iti vyapadeśo bhavati // 10
GS40caraka_u:2348: evaṃ kaṣāyānurase madhuni ca samādhānaṃ vācyam // 11
GS40caraka_u:2349_0: anye tu bruvate yattailādīnāṃ vātādiśamanatvaṃ pratyacintya eva prabhāvo 'yamucyate tatra ca tailavātayor viruddhaguṇayor
GS40caraka_u:2349_1: melake tailameva vātaṃ jayati na tu vātas tailam iti tailasyācintyaprabhāvaḥ evaṃ sarpirmadhunor api pittaśleṣmaharaṇe prabhāvājjñeye //
GS40caraka_u:2350_0: etaccānye necchanti yatas tailādīnāṃ satatam abhyasyamānamiti padenādhikyameva vātādijayakāraṇamuktaṃ tathā yaccānyad api
GS40caraka_u:2350_1: kiṃcid dravyam ityādigranthena dravyācintyaprabhāvaṃ parityajya sāmānyena guṇavaiparītyam evābhyāsād vātādijayahetur ucyate //
GS40caraka_u:2351: atha khalu trīṇi dravyāṇi nātyupayuñjītādhikam anyebhyo dravyebhyaḥ tadyathāpippalī kṣāraḥ lavaṇamiti // Car_3,1.15
GS40caraka_u:2354: adhikamanyebhya iti vacanādanyadapi citrakabhallātakādyevaṃjātīyaṃ nātyupayoktavyaṃ pippalyādidravyaṃ tv anyebhyo 'pyadhikam atyupayoge varjanīyamiti darśayati // 2]
GS40caraka_u:2355_0: pippalyo hi kaṭukāḥ satyo madhuravipākā gurvyo nātyarthaṃ snigdhoṣṇāḥ prakledinyo bheṣajābhimatāś ca tāḥ sadyaḥ śubhāśubhakāriṇyo
GS40caraka_u:2355_1: bhavanti āpātabhadrāḥ prayogasamasādguṇyāt doṣasaṃcayānubandhāḥ satatam upayujyamānā hi guruprakleditvācchleṣmāṇam utkleśayanti
GS40caraka_u:2355_2: auṣṇyāt pittaṃ na ca vātapraśamanāyopakalpante 'lpasnehoṣṇabhāvāt yogavāhinyastu khalu bhavanti tasmātpippalīr nātyupayuñjīta //
GS40caraka_u:2357_0: kaṭukāḥ satyo madhuravipākāḥ ityādi pippalīguṇakathanam anabhyāsaprayoge doṣavaiparītyena doṣapraśamanopadarśanārthaṃ tathā
GS40caraka_u:2360: śubhāśubhakāriṇyo bhavantīti sadyaḥ śubhakāriṇyaḥ atyabhyāsaprayoge tv aśubhakāriṇyaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:2362: prayogasamasādguṇyād iti samasya prayogasya sadguṇatvāt same 'lpakāle
GS40caraka_u:2366: pippalīdharmakathanaprastāvād guṇāntaram āha yogavāhinyas tv ityādi // 9
GS40caraka_u:2367: yogavāhitvena kaṭukānāmapi pippalīnāṃ vṛṣyaprayogeṣu yogaḥ tathā jvaragulmakuṣṭhaharādiprayogeṣu jvarādīn hanti pippalī // 10
GS40caraka_u:2369: tena pippalīrasāyanaprayogas tathā gulmādiṣu ca pippalīvardhamānakaprayogo na virodham āvahati ukte hi viṣaye yathoktavidhānena nirdoṣā eva pippalya iti ṛṣivacanād unnīyate /
GS40caraka_u:2370: anye tu annasaṃskaraṇe pippalyādīnām atiprayogo na tu svātantryeṇeti bruvate /
GS40caraka_u:2371: satatamupayujyamānā iti atimātratvena tathā satataprayogeṇa ceti jñeyam //
GS40caraka_u:2372: kṣāraḥ punar auṣṇyataikṣṇyalāghavopapannaḥ kledayatyādau paścādviśoṣayati sa pacanadahanabhedanārtham upayujyate so 'tiprayujyamānaḥ
GS40caraka_u:2374_0: ye hy enaṃ grāmanagaranigamajanapadāḥ satatam upayuñjate ta āndhyaṣāṇḍhyakhālityapālityabhājo hṛdayāpakartinaśca bhavanti
GS40caraka_u:2374_1: tadyathā prācyāś cīnāśca tasmātkṣāraṃ nātyupayuñjīta // Car_3,1.17
GS40caraka_u:2377_0: lavaṇaṃ punarauṣṇyataikṣṇyopapannam anatiguru anatisnigdham upakledi visraṃsanasamartham annadravyarucikaram āpātabhadraṃ
GS40caraka_u:2378: tad atyartham upayujyamānaṃ glāniśaithilyadaurbalyābhinirvṛttikaraṃ śarīrasya bhavati /
GS40caraka_u:2379: ye hy enad grāmanagaranigamajanapadāḥ satatamupayuñjate te bhūyiṣṭhaṃ glāsnavaḥ śithilamāṃsaśoṇitā aparikleśasahāś ca bhavanti /
GS40caraka_u:2380: tadyathā vāhlīkasaurāṣṭrikasaindhavasauvīrakāḥ te hi payasāpi saha lavaṇam aśnanti /
GS40caraka_u:2384: ye hy atilavaṇasātmyāḥ puruṣāsteṣāmapi khālityapālityāni valayaścākāle bhavanti // Car_3,1.18
GS40caraka_u:2387: na kevalaṃ lavaṇātiyogaḥ śarīropaghātakaraḥ kiṃtu bhūmer apyupaghātakara ityāha ye 'pīhetyādi ūṣarā iti lavaṇapradhānāḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:2388: lavaṇaṃ nātyupayuñjīteti nātimātraṃ lavaṇaṃ satatam upayuñjīta annadravyasaṃskārakaṃ tu stokamātram abhyāsenāpyupayojanīyam eva // 4
GS40caraka_u:2389: vāhlīkādivyatirikte 'pi deśe ye 'tilavaṇam aśnanti teṣāmapi doṣānāha ye hītyādi // 5
GS40caraka_u:2390: etena cānyatrāpi deśe 'timātralavaṇasātmyānāṃ lavaṇātyupayogakṛta eva śaithilyādidoṣa unnīyate na deśasvabhāvakṛtaḥ // 6]
GS40caraka_u:2392: sātmyamapi hi krameṇopanivartyamānam adoṣam alpadoṣaṃ vā bhavati //
GS40caraka_u:2395: tatsātmyata iti atimātrakṣārād atimātralavaṇāc ca sātmyāt // 2
GS40caraka_u:2398: alpadoṣam adoṣaṃ veti pakṣadvaye 'tyarthasātmyam alpadoṣaṃ bhavati anyattvadoṣam iti vyavasthā sātmyaṃ nāma tad yad ātmanyupaśete sātmyārtho hy upaśayārthaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2399: tattrividhaṃ pravarāvaramadhyavibhāgena saptavidhaṃ tu rasaikaikatvena sarvarasopayogācca
GS40caraka_u:2400: tatra sarvarasaṃ pravaram avaramekarasaṃ madhyaṃ tu pravarāvaramadhyastham
GS40caraka_u:2401: tatrāvaramadhyābhyāṃ sātmyābhyāṃ krameṇaiva pravaram upapādayet sātmyam /
GS40caraka_u:2402: sarvarasamapi ca sātmyam upapannaḥ prakṛtyādyupayoktraṣṭamāni sarvāṇyāhāravidhiviśeṣāyatanānyabhisamīkṣya hitam evānurudhyeta //
GS40caraka_u:2409: saptavidhaṃ tu ekaikarasena ṣaṭ saṃsṛṣṭarasopayogāccaikam evaṃ saptavidham
GS40caraka_u:2416: upapāditasarvarasasātmyenāpi cāhāraḥ praśastaprakṛtyādisampanna eva kartavya ityāha sarvarasam ityādi // 13
GS40caraka_u:2418: hitameveti padena yadeva prakṛtyādinā hitaṃ tad evānurudhyeta sevetetyarthaḥ // 15]
GS40caraka_u:2419: tatra khalvimānyaṣṭāv āhāravidhiviśeṣāyatanāni bhavanti tadyathā prakṛtikaraṇasaṃyogarāśideśakālopayogasaṃsthopayoktraṣṭamāni bhavanti //
GS40caraka_u:2421: āhārasya vidhiḥ prakāro vidhānaṃ vā ityāhāravidhiḥ tasya viśeṣo hitatvamahitatvaṃ ca tasyāyatanāni hetūn ity āhāravidhiviśeṣāyatanāni // 1
GS40caraka_u:2424: tatra prakṛtir ucyate svabhāvo yaḥ sa punarāhārauṣadhadravyāṇāṃ svābhāviko gurvādiguṇayogaḥ tadyathā maṣamudgayoḥ śūkaraiṇayośca /
GS40caraka_u:2428: māṣamudgayor iti prakṛtyā māṣe gurutvaṃ mudge ca laghutvaṃ śūkare gurutvam eṇe ca laghutvam karaṇaṃ punaḥ svābhāvikānāṃ dravyāṇām abhisaṃskāraḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2432: dravyāṇām iti vaktavye svābhāvikānām iti yat karoti tenotpattikāle janakabhūtaiḥ svaguṇāropaṇaṃ saṃskārastūtpannasyaiva toyādinā guṇāntarādhānamiti darśayati // 1
GS40caraka_u:2433: tacca prākṛtaguṇopamardenaiva kriyate yathā toyāgnisaṃnikarṣaśaucais taṇḍulasthaṃ gauravam upahatya lāghavam anne kriyate // 2
GS40caraka_u:2434: yaduktaṃ sudhautaḥ prasrutaḥ svinnaḥ saṃtaptaś caudano laghuḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:2436: manthanādguṇādhānaṃ yathā śothakṛd dadhi śothaghnaṃ sasnehamapi manthanāt iti // 5
GS40caraka_u:2437: deśena yathā bhasmarāśer adhaḥ sthāpayet ityādau // 6
GS40caraka_u:2439: bhāvanayā ca svarasādikṛtayā sthitasyaivāmalakāder guṇasyotkarṣo bhavati
GS40caraka_u:2441: bhājanena yathā traiphalenāyasīṃ pātrīṃ kalkenālepayet ityādau // 10
GS40caraka_u:2443_0: nanu saṃskārādheyena guṇena kathaṃ svābhāvikaguṇanāśaḥ kriyate yataḥ svabhāvo niṣpratikriyaḥ ityuktaṃ yadi hi saṃskāreṇa
GS40caraka_u:2443_1: svābhāvikagurutvaṃ pratikriyate tadā svabhāvo niṣpratikriyaḥ iti kathaṃ brūmaḥ svabhāvo niṣpratikriyaḥ iti svabhāvo bhāvānām
GS40caraka_u:2443_2: utpattau nānyathā kriyate // tena jātipratibaddhaṃ māṣādīnāṃ gurutvaṃ na tajjātau sphoṭayituṃ pāryate saṃskāreṇa tu tadanyathākaraṇamanumatameva
GS40caraka_u:2444: kaścit tu guṇo dravyāṇāṃ saṃskārādināpi nānyathā kriyate yathā vahner auṣṇyaṃ vāyoścalatvaṃ tailasya sneha ityādi // 14
GS40caraka_u:2447: uktaṃ hi guṇo dravyavināśād vā vināśam upagacchati // 17
GS40caraka_u:2449_0: yatra tu saṃskāreṇa vrīherlājalakṣaṇaṃ dravyāntarameva janyate tatra guṇāntarotpādaḥ suṣṭhveva saṃyogaḥ punar dvayor bahūnāṃ
GS40caraka_u:2449_1: vā dravyāṇāṃ saṃhatībhāvaḥ sa viśeṣamārabhate yaṃ punar naikaikaśo dravyāṇyārabhante tad yathā madhusarpiṣoḥ madhumatsyapayasāṃ
GS40caraka_u:2452: sa viśeṣamārabhata iti saṃyujyamānadravyaikadeśe 'dṛṣṭaṃ kāryam ārabhata ityarthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:2453: yaṃ naikaikaśa iti yaṃ viśeṣaṃ pratyekasaṃyujyamānāni dravyāṇi nārabhanta ityarthaḥ // 3
GS40caraka_u:2454: madhusarpiṣī hi pratyekamamārake milite tu mārake bhavataḥ kṣīramatsyādisaṃyogaśca kuṣṭhādikaro bhavati // 4
GS40caraka_u:2455: saṃyogas tv iha prādhānyenaivopalabhyamānadravyamelako vivakṣitas tena bhāvanādiṣvapi yadyapi saṃyogo 'sti tathāpi tatra bhāvanādravyāṇāṃ
GS40caraka_u:2458: tatra sarvasyāhārasya pramāṇagrahaṇam ekapiṇḍena sarvagrahaḥ parigrahaḥ punaḥ pramāṇagrahaṇam ekaikaśyenāhāradravyāṇām /
GS40caraka_u:2459: sarvasya hi grahaḥ sarvagrahaḥ sarvataśca grahaḥ parigraha ucyate /
GS40caraka_u:2462: mātrāmātraphalaviniścayārtha iti mātrāvadāhārauṣadhasya ca yat phalaṃ śubham amātrasya hīnasyātiriktasya vā yat phalam aśubham // 2
GS40caraka_u:2463: yaduktaṃ tasya jñānārtham ucitapramāṇam anucitapramāṇaṃ ca rāśisaṃjñaṃ bhavati // 3
GS40caraka_u:2467_0: ekaikaśyeneti annasya kuḍavaḥ sūpasya palaṃ māṃsasya dvipalamityādyavayavamānapūrvakaṃ samudāyamānam sarvagrahe pratyavayavamānaniyamo
GS40caraka_u:2467_1: nāsti tena yena kenacid āhāreṇa pratyekamaniyatamānena sampūrṇāhāramātrāniyamanaṃ sarvagrahaḥ // 8
GS40caraka_u:2470: deśaḥ punaḥ sthānaṃ sa dravyāṇāmutpattipracārau deśasātmyaṃ cācaṣṭe /
GS40caraka_u:2475: tatrotpattyā himavati jātaṃ guṇavadbhavati marau jātaṃ laghu bhavati ityādi // 4
GS40caraka_u:2476: pracāreṇa laghu bhakṣyāṇāṃ prāṇināṃ tathā dhanvapracāriṇāṃ bahukriyāṇāṃ ca lāghavaṃ viparyaye ca gauravaṃ gṛhyate // 5
GS40caraka_u:2477: deśasāmyena ca deśaviparītaguṇaṃ sātmyaṃ gṛhyate yathānūpe uṣṇarūkṣādi dhanvani ca śītasnigdhādi okasātmyaṃ tu upayoktṛgrahaṇena gṛhītam // 7]
GS40caraka_u:2478: kālo hi nityagaś cāvasthikaśca tatrāvasthiko vikāramapekṣate nityagastu ṛtusātmyāpekṣaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2482: vikāramapekṣata iti bālyādikṛtaṃ tu śleṣmavikāraṃ jvarādikaṃ cāhāraniyamārthamapekṣata ityarthaḥ ṛtusātmyaṃ hi ṛtumapekṣata iti ṛtusātmyāpekṣaḥ // 4]
GS40caraka_u:2485_0: evamāhāropayogaḥ kartavya evaṃ na kartavya ityupayoganiyamaḥ sa jīrṇalakṣaṇāpekṣa iti prādhānyenoktaḥ teneha ajalpann ahasan
GS40caraka_u:2485_1: nātidrutaṃ nātivilambitam ityādyupayoganiyamamapyapekṣata eva ajīrṇabhojane tu mahāṃstridoṣakopalakṣaṇo doṣo bhavatītyayam
GS40caraka_u:2489: yadāyattam okasātmyam iti bhoktṛpuruṣāpekṣaṃ hy abhyāsasātmyaṃ bhavati kasyaciddhi kiṃcid evābhyāsāt pathyamapathyaṃ vā sātmyaṃ bhavati // 1]
GS40caraka_u:2490_0: eṣāṃ viśeṣāḥ śubhāśubhaphalāḥ parasparopakārakā bhavanti tān bubhutseta buddhvā ca hitepsureva syāt na ca mohāt pramādādvā
GS40caraka_u:2490_1: priyam ahitam asukhodarkam upasevyam āhārajātam anyadvā kiṃcit [{Āyurvedadīpikā}
GS40caraka_u:2491: eṣāmityādau śubhaphalā viśeṣā aśubhaphalāśca parasparopakārakā bhavantīti jñeyam // 1
GS40caraka_u:2492: tatra prakṛtyā lāghavādiḥ śubhaphalaḥ gurvādiś cāśubhaphalaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:2495: evaṃ kālāsātmyamaśubhaphalaṃ cājīrṇabhojanādi tathā okāsātmyaṃ cāśubhamaśubhaphalamiti jñeyaṃ viparītaṃ tu śubhaphalam // 5
GS40caraka_u:2496: mohāditi ajñānāt pramādāditi jñātvāpi rāgād ityarthaḥ // 6
GS40caraka_u:2499: asukhaṃ duḥkharūpam udarka uttarakālīnaṃ phalaṃ yasya sa tathā // 9
GS40caraka_u:2501_0: tatredamāhāravidhividhānamarogāṇāmāturāṇāṃ cāpi keṣāṃcit kāle prakṛtyaiva hitatamaṃ bhuñjānānāṃ bhavati uṣṇaṃ snigdhaṃ mātrāvat
GS40caraka_u:2501_1: jīrṇe vīryāviruddham iṣṭe deśe iṣṭasarvopakaraṇaṃ nātidrutaṃ nātivilambitam ajalpan ahasan tanmanā bhuñjīta ātmānamabhisamīkṣya
GS40caraka_u:2505: āturāṇāṃ ca keṣāṃciditi padena raktapittināṃ śītameva kapharogiṇāṃ rūkṣameva hitamityādiviparyayaṃ darśayati // 3
GS40caraka_u:2506: keṣāṃcidbhuñjānānām idam āhāravidhividhānaṃ hitatamaṃ bhavatīti yojanā //
GS40caraka_u:2507_0: prakṛtyaiveti svabhāvenaiva hitatamaṃ hitatamam ityuktaṃ tena yat prakṛtyā hitaṃ tat kadācideva kaṃcideva puruṣam āsādyāhitaṃ
GS40caraka_u:2507_1: bhavati tacca kādācitkatvād anādṛtaṃ tena prāyikatvādenaṃ hitatamaṃ vakṣyāma iti bhāvaḥ // 5
GS40caraka_u:2509_0: tasya sādguṇyam upadekṣyāma uṣṇam aśnīyād uṣṇaṃ hi bhujyamānaṃ svadate bhuktaṃ cāgnim audaryam udīrayati kṣipraṃ jarāṃ gacchati
GS40caraka_u:2509_1: vātam anulomayati śleṣmāṇaṃ ca parihrāsayati tasmāduṣṇam aśnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:2510_0: snigdhamaśnīyāt snigdhaṃ hi bhujyamānaṃ svadate bhuktaṃ cānudīrṇam agnim udīrayati kṣipraṃ jarāṃ gacchati vātamanulomayati
GS40caraka_u:2510_1: śarīramupacinoti dṛḍhīkarotīndriyāṇi balābhivṛddhim upajanayati varṇaprasādaṃ cābhinirvartayati tasmāt snigdhamaśnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:2515_0: mātrāvadaśnīyāt mātrāvaddhi bhuktaṃ vātapittakaphān apīḍayad āyur eva vivardhayati kevalaṃ sukhaṃ gudam anuparyeti na coṣmāṇamupahanti
GS40caraka_u:2516: mātrāvaditi praśaṃsāyāṃ matup tena praśastamātram ityarthaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:2517: apīḍayaditi anatimātratvena svasthānasthitaṃ sadvātādīn sthānāpīḍanād aprakopayat // 2
GS40caraka_u:2520: jīrṇe 'śnīyāt ajīrṇe hi bhuñjānasyābhyavahṛtam āhārajātaṃ pūrvasyāhārasya rasam apariṇatam uttareṇāhārarasenopasṛjat sarvān doṣān prakopayatyāśu
GS40caraka_u:2521_0: jīrṇe tu bhuñjānasya svasthānastheṣu doṣeṣvagnau codīrṇe jātāyāṃ ca bubhukṣāyāṃ vivṛteṣu ca srotasāṃ mukheṣu viśuddhe codgāre
GS40caraka_u:2521_1: hṛdaye viśuddhe vātānulomye visṛṣṭeṣu ca vātamūtrapurīṣavegeṣvabhyavahṛtam āhārajātaṃ sarvaśarīradhātūn apradūṣayad āyur
GS40caraka_u:2526: āhāraraseneti āhārapariṇāmagatena madhurādinā kiṃvā āhārajena rasena // 3
GS40caraka_u:2528: vīryāviruddham aśnīyāt aviruddhavīryam aśnan hi viruddhavīryāhārajairvikārair nopasṛjyate tasmād vīryāviruddham aśnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:2531_0: iṣṭe deśe iṣṭasarvopakaraṇaṃ cāśnīyāt iṣṭe hi deśe bhuñjāno nāniṣṭadeśajairmanovighātakarair bhāvair manovighātaṃ prāpnoti
GS40caraka_u:2531_1: tathaiveṣṭaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ tasmādiṣṭe deśe tatheṣṭasarvopakaraṇaṃ cāśnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:2533: manovighātakarairbhāvairiti trividhakukṣīye vakṣyamāṇaiḥ kāmādibhiś cittopatāpakaraiś cittavikārair ityarthaḥ // 1
GS40caraka_u:2534: tatheṣṭaiśca sarvopakaraṇair bhuñjāno manovighātaṃ na prāpnotīti yojanā aniṣṭabhojanāder manovighāto bhavati // 2]
GS40caraka_u:2535: nātidrutamaśnīyāt atidrutaṃ hi bhuñjānasyotsnehanamavasādanaṃ bhojanasyāpratiṣṭhānaṃ ca bhojyadoṣasādguṇyopalabdhiś ca na niyatā tasmānnātidrutam aśnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:2540: bhojyagatānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ keśādīnāṃ sādguṇyasya ca svādutvādeḥ upalabdhir na niyatā bhavati kadācidupalabhyate kadācin neti // 4
GS40caraka_u:2541: tatra doṣānupalabdhyā sadoṣasyaiva bhakṣaṇaṃ sādguṇyānupalabdhyā ca prītyabhāvaḥ // 5]
GS40caraka_u:2542: nātivilambitam aśnīyāt ativilambitaṃ hi bhuñjāno na tṛptim adhigacchati bahu bhuṅkte śītībhavaty āhārajātaṃ viṣamaṃ ca pacyate tasmānnātivilambitam aśnīyāt /
GS40caraka_u:2544: viṣamaṃ ca pacyata iti cirakālabhojanenāgnisambandhasya vaiṣamyāditi bhāvaḥ // 1]
GS40caraka_u:2545: ajalpannahasan tanmanā jalpato hasato 'nyamanasa vā bhuñjānasya ta eva hi doṣā bhavanti ya evātidrutam aśnataḥ tasmād ajalpannahasaṃstanmanā bhuñjīta /
GS40caraka_u:2547: ya evātidrutam aśnato doṣā iti utsnehanādayaḥ // 1]
GS40caraka_u:2548: ātmānam abhisamīkṣya bhuñjīta samyag idaṃ mamopaśete idaṃ nopaśeta ityevaṃ viditaṃ hy asyātmana ātmasātmyaṃ bhavati tasmādātmānamabhisamīkṣya bhuñjīta samyagiti // Car_3,1.25
GS40caraka_u:2550: nopaśeta itītyatra itiśabdena sātmyāsātmyavidhānopadarśakena vicāraphalamokasātmyasevanaṃ darśayati // 1
GS40caraka_u:2551: ātmana iti padenātmanaivātmasātmyaṃ pratipuruṣaṃ jñāyate na śāstropadeśeneti darśayati //
GS40caraka_u:2553: veda yo deśakālau ca śarīraṃ ca sa no bhiṣak // Car_3,1.26
GS40caraka_u:2556: sa no bhiṣagiti no 'smākaṃ saṃmata ityarthaḥ // 1]
GS40caraka_u:2558: dravyāṇi nātisevyāni trividhaṃ sātmyameva ca // Car_3,1.27
GS40caraka_u:2561: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte vimānasthāne rasavimānaṃ nāma
GS40caraka_u:2564: doṣavikārau ca yadyapi trividhakukṣīye prabhāvavistāreṇa vaktavyau tathāpīha saṃkṣepeṇoktāv eva tena doṣavikāraprabhāvāv apyuktāv iti yaducyate saṃgrahe tat sādhu // 1
GS40caraka_u:2565: tailādidravyatrayakathanaṃ ca dravyaprabhāvagṛhītamiti kṛtvā na pṛthak saṃgrahe paṭhitam //
GS40caraka_u:2568: iti ha smāha bhagavān ātreyaḥ // Car_5,1.2
GS40caraka_u:2570: puruṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ kasmāt prabhavaḥ puruṣasya kaḥ // Car_5,1.3
GS40caraka_u:2571: kim ajño jñaḥ sa nityaḥ kiṃ kim anityo nidarśitaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2572: prakṛtiḥ kā vikārāḥ ke kiṃ liṅgaṃ puruṣasya ca // Car_5,1.4
GS40caraka_u:2573: niṣkriyaṃ ca svatantraṃ ca vaśinaṃ sarvagaṃ vibhum /
GS40caraka_u:2574: vadanty ātmānam ātmajñāḥ kṣetrajñaṃ sākṣiṇaṃ tathā // Car_5,1.5
GS40caraka_u:2575: niṣkriyasya kriyā tasya bhagavan vidyate katham /
GS40caraka_u:2576: svatantraś ced aniṣṭāsu kathaṃ yoniṣu jāyate // Car_5,1.6
GS40caraka_u:2577: vaśī yady asukhaiḥ kasmād bhāvair ākramyate balāt /
GS40caraka_u:2578: sarvāḥ sarvagatatvāc ca vedanāḥ kiṃ na vetti saḥ // Car_5,1.7
GS40caraka_u:2580: kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetram athavā kiṃ pūrvam iti saṃśayaḥ // Car_5,1.8
GS40caraka_u:2581: jñeyaṃ kṣetraṃ vinā pūrvaṃ kṣetrajño hi na yujyate /
GS40caraka_u:2582: kṣetraṃ ca yadi pūrvaṃ syāt kṣetrajñaḥ syād aśāśvataḥ // Car_5,1.9
GS40caraka_u:2583: sākṣibhūtaś ca kasyāyaṃ kartā hy anyo na vidyate /
GS40caraka_u:2584: syāt kathaṃ cāvikārasya viśeṣo vedanākṛtaḥ // Car_5,1.10
GS40caraka_u:2585: atha cārtasya bhagavaṃs tisṛṇāṃ kāṃ cikitsati /
GS40caraka_u:2586: atītāṃ vedanāṃ vaidyo vartamānāṃ bhaviṣyatīm // Car_5,1.11
GS40caraka_u:2588: sāṃpratikyā api sthānaṃ nāsty arteḥ saṃśayo hy ataḥ // Car_5,1.12
GS40caraka_u:2589: kāraṇaṃ vedanānāṃ kiṃ kim adhiṣṭhānam ucyate /

GS40caraka_u:2592: ekaḥ praśānto bhūtātmā kair liṅgair upalabhyate // Car_5,1.14
GS40caraka_u:2593: ity agniveśasya vacaḥ śrutvā matimatāṃ varaḥ /
GS40caraka_u:2594: sarvaṃ yathāvat provāca praśāntātmā punarvasuḥ // Car_5,1.15
GS40caraka_u:2596: cetanādhātur apy ekaḥ smṛtaḥ puruṣasaṃjñakaḥ // Car_5,1.16
GS40caraka_u:2598: mano daśendriyāṇy arthāḥ prakṛtiś cāṣṭadhātukī // Car_5,1.17
GS40caraka_u:2599: lakṣaṇaṃ manaso jñānasyābhāvo bhāva eva ca /
GS40caraka_u:2600: sati hy ātmendriyārthānāṃ sannikarṣe na vartate // Car_5,1.18
GS40caraka_u:2601: vaivṛttyān manaso jñānaṃ sānnidhyāt tac ca vartate /
GS40caraka_u:2602: aṇutvam atha caikatvaṃ dvau guṇau manasaḥ smṛtau // Car_5,1.19
GS40caraka_u:2603: cintyaṃ vicāryam ūhyaṃ ca dhyeyaṃ saṃkalpyam eva ca /
GS40caraka_u:2604: yat kiṃcin manaso jñeyaṃ tat sarvaṃ hy arthasaṃjñakam // Car_5,1.20
GS40caraka_u:2606: ūho vicāraś ca tataḥ paraṃ buddhiḥ pravartate // Car_5,1.21
GS40caraka_u:2609: cintyaṃ kartavyatayā akartavyatayā vā yanmanasā cintyate // 2
GS40caraka_u:2611: ūhyaṃ ca yat sambhāvanayā ūhyate evametadbhaviṣyati iti // 4
GS40caraka_u:2616: ete ca mano'rthāḥ śabdādirūpā eva tena ṣaṣṭhārthakalpanayā na caturviṃśatisaṃkhyātirekaḥ sukhādayas tu śabdādivyatiriktā mano'rthā buddhibhedagrahaṇenaiva grāhyāḥ // 10
GS40caraka_u:2618_0: indriyābhigrahaḥ indriyādhiṣṭhānaṃ manasaḥ karma tathā svasya nigraho manasaḥ karma mano hy aniṣṭaviṣayaprasṛtaṃ manasaiva
GS40caraka_u:2618_1: niyamyate manaśca guṇāntarayuktaṃ sadviṣayāntarān niyamayati ityāhureke // 12
GS40caraka_u:2620: niyantum ahitād arthād dhṛtirhi niyamātmikā iti // 14
GS40caraka_u:2621: tena dhṛtyā kāraṇabhūtayā ātmānaṃ niyamayatīti na svātmani kriyāvirodhaḥ // 15
GS40caraka_u:2623: atroha ālocanajñānaṃ nirvikalpakam vicāro heyopādeyatayā vikalpanam // 17
GS40caraka_u:2624: caturvidhaṃ hi vikalpakāraṇaṃ sāṃkhyā manyante tatra bāhyam indriyarūpam ābhyantaraṃ tu mano'haṃkāro buddhiśceti tritayam // 18
GS40caraka_u:2625: tatrendriyāṇyālocayanti nirvikalpena gṛhṇantītyarthaḥ manastu saṃkalpayati heyopādeyatayā kalpayatītyarthaḥ ahaṃkāro 'bhimanyate
GS40caraka_u:2626: mamedamahamatrādhikṛta iti manyata ityarthaḥ buddhir adhyavasyati tyajāmyenaṃ doṣavantam upādadāmyenaṃ guṇavantam ityadhyavasāyaṃ karotītyarthaḥ // 19
GS40caraka_u:2627: ūhas tu yadyapi bāhyacakṣurādikarma tathāpi tatrāpi mano'dhiṣṭhānam astīti manaḥkarmatayoktaḥ vacanaṃ hi sāntaḥkaraṇā buddhiḥ sarvaṃ viṣayam avagāhate yasmāt // 21
GS40caraka_u:2628: tasmāt trividhaṃ karaṇaṃ dvāri dvārāṇi śeṣāṇi iti // 22
GS40caraka_u:2629: tataḥ paraṃ buddhiḥ pravartata iti ūhavicārānantaraṃ buddhir adhyavasāyaṃ karotītyarthaḥ //
GS40caraka_u:2630: ahaṃkāravyāpāraś cābhimananam ihānukto 'pi buddhivyāpāreṇaiva sūcito jñeyaḥ // 24
GS40caraka_u:2631: buddhirhi tyajāmyenamupādadāmīti vādhyavasāyaṃ kurvatī ahaṃkārābhimata eva viṣaye bhavati tena buddhivyāpāreṇaivāhaṃkāravyāpāro 'pi gṛhyate // 25
GS40caraka_u:2636: kalpyate manasā tūrdhvaṃ guṇato doṣato'thavā // Car_5,1.22
GS40caraka_u:2638: vyavasyati tayā vaktuṃ kartuṃ vā buddhipūrvakam // Car_5,1.23
GS40caraka_u:2647: vyavasyatīti anuṣṭhānaṃ karoti udyukto bhavatītyarthaḥ buddhyadhyavasitamarthaṃ vaktuṃ kartuṃ vānutiṣṭhatīti yāvat // 8
GS40caraka_u:2648: buddhipūrvakamityanena yadeva buddhipūrvakam anuṣṭhānaṃ tad evaivaṃvidhaṃ bhavati nonmattādyanuṣṭhānamiti darśayati // 9]
GS40caraka_u:2650: pañca karmānumeyāni yebhyo buddhiḥ pravartate // Car_5,1.24
GS40caraka_u:2652: mano'bhidhāyendriyāṇyabhidhatte tatrāpi jyāyastvād buddhīndriyāṇi prāgāha ekaiketyādi // 1

GS40caraka_u:4180: yadābdhātur janayati tadā pittasaṃtapta eva janayatīti pittasyaiva kartṛtvam // 5]
GS40caraka_u:4182: liṅgaṃ tasyāś cārucir ādhmānakaphaprasekau ca // Car_6,22.15
GS40caraka_u:4185: āmaśabdena ceha lakṣaṇayā āmasamānacikitsita āmasamānalakṣaṇaś ca kapho
GS40caraka_u:4187: tenāmaprabhavāyā vyutpādanena kaphajāpi suśrutoktā gṛhītaiveha sāpyāgneyetyanena pūrvaparijñātaṃ sarvāsāṃ vātapittajanyatvaṃ samunnayati // 3
GS40caraka_u:4188: vātaśca tṛṣṇākāraṇatvenokto'pyatrāpradhānaṃ pittameva ye pradhānam itīha vātākathanād unnīyate anyatrāpyuktaṃ darśanapaktirūṣmā ca kṣuttṛṣṇā dehamārdavam // 5
GS40caraka_u:4191: deho rasajo'mbubhavo rasaśca tasya kṣayācca tṛṣyeddhi /
GS40caraka_u:4195: āhārarasāt sarvadhātupoṣako dhāturasa utpadyate sa ca raso dehapoṣako 'mbubhava iti āpya ityarthaḥ // 2
GS40caraka_u:4196: tasya kṣayāditi rasakṣayāt tṛṣyate rasakṣayād ambukṣayo bhavati tena cāmbukṣayeṇa puruṣaḥ pānīyaprārthanārūpatṛṣṇayā yukto bhavatīti yuktam iti darśayati // 3
GS40caraka_u:4197: uktaṃ hi suśrute doṣadhātumalakṣīṇo balakṣīṇo'pi mānavaḥ // 4
GS40caraka_u:4198: svayonivardhanaṃ yat tad annapānaṃ prakāṅkṣati iti ihāpi coktaṃ tasya kṣayācca tṛṣyeddhi iti bhavati khalu yopasargāttṛṣṇā sā śoṣiṇī kaṣṭā /
GS40caraka_u:4204_0: evaṃ prāksūtritavātapittāmāmbukṣayopasargātmikāḥ pañca tṛṣṇā vyāhṛtāḥ atraiva suśrutoktā kaphajā āmajāyām avaruddhā kṣatajā
GS40caraka_u:4204_1: upasargātmikāyām avaruddhā annajā cāmajāyām evāntarbhāvanīyā // sarvāstvatiprasaktā rogakṛśānāṃ vamiprasaktānām /
